Otra integrante del grupo es Alba Maritza ella se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva las cuales distribuye de manera ambulante. El mayor obstáculo que ha tenido ha sido las enfermedades de si hijo. El financiamiento es para la compra de camisa, pantalones, short, faldas y trajes.
texts.en:
The solidarity group “El Rosario” consists of Manuel de Jesús, German Francisco, Lucia del Rosario, María Elena, and Alba Maritza.

Don German is 24 years old, single, and has no children. He sells Nicaraguan tamales and makes mincemeat out of pork. In the future, he hopes to establish a food stand in his home where he can sell on the weekends. For this reason, he is requesting a loan to buy cornmeal, pork, leaves, and bags.

Another member of the group is Alba Maritza. She sells new clothing as a traveling merchant. Her main challenge has been dealing with her son’s illnesses. Her loan will be used to buy shirts, trousers, shorts, skirts, and suits.

loans.use: to buy cornmeal, pork, leaves, and bags.

loans.name: Kossiwa

texts.fr:
Kossiwa est une femme âgée de 56ans. Elle est mariée å un mécanicien. Elle n’a pas d’enfants.
Kossiwa travaille comme revendeuse d’ustensiles en plastiques depuis 1980. Elle vend à ses clients dans un marché de la place. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. 
Kossiwa a requis son second cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des ustensiles de cuisine et des produits d’alimentation générale.
texts.en:
Kossiwa is a 56-year-old woman married to a mechanic.  She has no children.  She has worked as a reseller of plastic utensils since 1980.  She sells to her customers in a local marketplace and buys her products in Lomé.

Kossiwa requested her second loan from WAGES in order to buy kitchen utensils and food products.

loans.use: to buy plastic kitchen utensils and food products.

loans.name: German

texts.es: El señor German trabaja como chofer de minibús de transporte de pasajeros en el radio urbano de la ciudad de La Paz y es socio del sindicato de choferes “litoral”; su esposa se dedica al comercio de ropa. El crédito lo requiere para la reparación de su vehiculo, específicamente la caja del mismo, pues tiene algunos problemas. Vive en casa de sus padres  la misma queda ubicada en la zona Alto San Pedro en la ciudad de La Paz; es casado y  tiene  dos hijos. El cliente esta satisfecho por los créditos que obtuvo hasta la fecha y esta es la segunda vez que su crédito se canaliza a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sr. German works as a chauffeur and drives a passenger minibus within the urban radius of the city of La Paz. He is a member of the “Litoral” transportation union. His wife is a clothing merchant. The loan he is requesting will be used to repair his vehicle, specifically the gearbox, because it has been experiencing a few problems. German lives at the home of his parents in the District of Alto San Pedro in the city of La Paz. He is married and has two children.

German is pleased with the loans he has received to date. This is the second time his loan has been referred to Kiva for funding.

loans.use: to pay the cost of repairing the gearbox in his minibus.

loans.name: Nemecio

texts.es: El señor Nemesio tiene un puesto de Internet donde realiza transcripciones, investigaciones para estudiantes y universitarios. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de servicio de Internet con mayor rapidez y calidad para ofrecer una versión mejorada a sus clientes. Vive en casa propia  la misma queda ubicada en la zona Pasankeri en la ciudad de La Paz; es divorciado y tiene dos hijos. Es la primera vez que obtiene un crédito en IMPRO, y por su espíritu emprendedor recurrimos a los financiadores de Kiva para ayudar a Nemesio.
texts.en:
Sr. Nemesio has an Internet café where high school and college students can come to type up reports and perform research. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy Internet service that is faster and of better quality than what he currently offers to his customers. Nemesio lives in his own home in the District of Pasankeri in the city of La Paz. He is divorced and has two children.

This is the first time he has obtained a loan through IMPRO. Nemesio is being presented to Kiva lenders for assistance because of his enterprising spirit.

loans.use: to buy faster and more reliable Internet service for his customers.

loans.name: Gladys Esperanza

texts.es: Gladys Esperanza tiene su negocio que es la venta de mercadería en general, hace más de tres años que tiene este negocio, lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es relacionarse con sus clientes que le solicita diferentes pedidos por lo que Gladys tiene que viajar a Managua para obtener productos a precios favorables. Gladys se levanta a las siete de mañana para hacer la visita a sus diferentes clientes, esta es una forma  en la que atrae a sus clientes. El crédito es para la compra de sabanas, perfumes, prendas, ropa en general, manteles, calzados, bolsas y trajes.
texts.en:
Gladys Esperanza has been in the business of selling general merchandise for more than three years. What she enjoys most about her job is the relationship with her customers. They request different items, so she must travel to Managua to obtain these products at favorable prices. Gladys wakes up at 7am in order to visit her various customers. This is also how she attracts new customers.

This loan will be used to buy bed sheets, perfumes, jewelry, clothing, blankets, shoes, bags, and suits.

loans.use: to buy bed sheets, perfumes, jewelry, clothing, blankets, shoes, bags, and suits.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: El señor Juan trabaja como chofer propietario de un vehiculo de transporte de pasajeros y es socio del sindicato de choferes Eduardo Avaroa. El crédito lo requiere para compra de llantas nuevas y un mantenimiento general del vehiculo. Vive en casa de sus padres  la misma queda ubicada en la zona Tembladerani en la ciudad de La Paz, es casado y tiene dos hijos. Es la primera vez que obtiene un crédito en IMPRO.
texts.en:
Sr. Juan is an independent driver and transports passengers with his own vehicle. He is a member of the Eduardo Avaroa taxi union. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy new tires and pay for general maintenance of his vehicle. He lives at the home of his parents in the District of Tembladerani in the city of La Paz. Juan is married and has two children.

This is the first time he has obtained a loan from IMPRO.

loans.use: to buy new tires and pay for general vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Mamuka

texts.en:
Mamuka is from the village of Patara Lilo, Gardabani District. He is 50 years old, married and lives with his family: wife – Maka, two daughters (7 and 5 years old) and his parents. 

Mamuka is a truck driver. He works as a contractor on a local sand-pit. He transports the sand. He gets 500 Laris per month. Mamuka’s parents are managing the dairy farm owned by the family. They have 4 milk cows and produce yogurt from the milk, which is sold in grocery stores in Tbilisi (capital city of the country). Maka is a housewife. Mamuka and Maka’s elder daughter goes to school and the younger one goes to kindergarten. The family's total average income is 1500 Laris. 

Mamuka has requested credit for changing the tire-covers of his truck, as the old ones are in bad conditions already and may cause danger to the driver. The new tire-covers will serve him for 2 years.

loans.use: to purchase tire-covers for the truck.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for engine repairs and general vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Ami Marie

texts.fr:
Ami est une femme  âgée de 39 ans. Elle est mariée à  un statisticien. Elle a 2 enfants qui sont tous les deux scolarisés.
Ami travaille comme  revendeuse   depuis 2001. Elle vend les produits d’alimentation générale à la maison. 
Ami a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des produits d’alimentation générale. Elle veut augmenter son capital d’achat. 
Dans les prochaines années, Ami voudrait élargir davantage sa boutique. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit aider son mari pour subvenir aux besoins de la famille.
texts.en:
Ami is a 39-year-old woman married to a statistician.  She has two children, both in school.  Ami has worked as a reseller since 2001; she sells food products from her home.  

Ami requested her first loan from WAGES in order to buy food products.  She wants to increase her buying capital.  In the next few years, she would like to expand her store.  With the profits, she plans to help her husband meet the family’s needs.

loans.use: to buy food products.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es: La señora Ruth tiene una tienda donD. se dedica a al venta D. víveres y artefactos domésticos. El crédito lo requiere para cancelar una operación D. varices que ella tiene que someterse lo más antes posible pues el dolor es insoportable y a veces no le deja atender su negocio. Vive en casa propia la misma queda ubicada en la zona D. Sopocachi en la ciudad D. La Paz; es  divorciada tiene un hijo. Es la primera vez que la cliente trabaja con IMPRO y se canaliza a través D. Kiva.
texts.en:
Sra. Ruth has a shop where she sells food and household products.  The loan she is requesting will be used to pay for an operation to treat her varicose veins.  She needs this procedure as soon as possible because the pain is unbearable and sometimes she is not able to attend to her business.  Ruth lives in her own home in the District of Sopocachi in the city of La Paz.  She is divorced and has one child.  

This is the first time she has worked with IMPRO, so she is being referred to Kiva for funding.

loans.use: to pay for an operation.

loans.name: Abahujumugambi /rhh 2 Group

texts.fr: Bosco est le client d.ACB,il est le membre du groupe Abahujumugambi.Il  est marie, il a 31 ans, il a 3 enfants entre 8 ans et 9 ans et 1 enfant va à l’école ,il a la nationalité Rwandais, il 5 ans des études primaire. C’est son première cycle de prêt avec ACB, et avec le prêt il va acheter des fertilisants (urée, NPK)et payé main d'oeuvre.la stratégie pour la croissance de l’affaire est d’améliorer les activités actuelle de l’agriculture de riz. Pour son ambition il voudrait être grossiste, paye les frais des scolarités pour ses enfants et paye le frais médicaux pour la famille.
texts.en: Bosco is a client of ACB and member of the Abahujumugambi group.  He is 31 years old and married with three children between 8 and 9 years old, one of whom is in school.  He is of Rwandan nationality and has five years of primary studies.  This is his first loan with ACB, and with the loan he will buy fertilizer (urea, NPK) and pay labor costs.  His strategy for business growth is to improve his present rice cultivation activity.  His ambitions are to become a wholesaler and pay his children’s school fees and healthcare costs for the family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers (urea, NPK) and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Marco

texts.es: El señor Marco es albañil y trabaja independientemente. El crédito lo requiere para comprar material de construcción como ser cemento y arena para un contrato que obtuvo en una casa particular. Vive en casa propia la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Pasankeri en la ciudad de La Paz; es soltero y no  tiene hijos. Marco ya obtuvo un crédito anterior de IMPRO y ahora canalizamos el presente crédito a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sr. Marco is a mason and works independently. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy construction materials, such as cement and sand, for a contract job he obtained for a private residence. Marco lives in his own home in the District of Pasankeri in the city of La Paz. He is single and has no children.

Marco received a previous loan from IMPRO, but now this current loan is being referred to Kiva for funding.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand in order to complete a contract job.

loans.name: San Juan Group

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Asunción se formó un comité denominado San Juan, integrado por 18 mujeres de dicha ciudad. Ellas están en el octavo ciclo del programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la Fundación Paraguaya. Ellas se unieron con un objetivo en común, que es la obtención de mayores ingresos para cada una de ellas. Desean un desarrollarse no solo en el ámbito económico, sino también personal.
Ellas se definen como mujeres muy trabajadoras y luchadoras que día a día luchan por el sustento de su familia. Desean un futuro mejor para sus hijos y de todos aquellos que de ellas dependen.
La señora Seferina se dedica a la venta de comestibles, como ser empanadas, sandwish y demás minutas. Ella comenta que tiene una buena cantidad de clientes que siempre compran de ella sus productos. Gracias a este trabajo ella puede ayudar con los gastos de la casa y ayudar también a su familia. Le gustaría poder abrir un restaurante donde pueda deleitar a los clientes con sus comidas.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de ingredientes necesarios para la elaboración de sus alimentos, como ser carne, condimentos, hortalizas y demás. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le da.
texts.en:
The committee named “San Juan” was established in the city of Asunción and consists of 18 women. They are in their eighth loan cycle as part of the Program of Women Entrepreneurs with Fundación Paraguaya. The ladies have joined together with a common goal, to generate more income for each of their families. Not only do they want to grow financially, but also on a personal level. The members define themselves as hardworking and determined women who strive each day to sustain their families. They desire the best future for their children and their other dependents.

Sra. Serefina sells food such as empanadas, sandwiches, and other quick dishes. She says that she has a large number of customers who always buy her products. Thanks to her work, Serefina is able to help with the household expenses and those of her family. She would like to open a restaurant where her customers can delight in her food.

Ths loan she is requesting will be used to buy the necessary ingredients for preparing her dishes such as meat, condiments, vegetables, and other items. Serefina is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya for the opportunity that has been given to her.

loans.use: to buy meat, condiments, vegetables, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Enver

texts.en:
Enver is from the village Naesakovo, Samegrelo Region, West Georgia. He is 62 years old and lives with his family: his wife, Isolda and their 31 year old daughter. Enver works as a sports teacher in a local school and gets a salary in the amount of 150 Laris per month. Along with his main job, he is actively involved in the family agricultural business. The family owns 3 milk cows and 4 calves. Isolda produces and sells approximately 45 kg of traditional West-Georgian cheese per month at the local open market. They also have a pig and sell 10-12 piglets per year.  

Enver’s family also owns 1 hectare of land, where maize and soy-beans are grown. Each year they harvest 4 tonnes of the maize and 700 kg of the soy-beans. From the harvested corn, only 400 kg of soy-bean is sold on local open market. The rest is used in the farm for feeding cows and pigs. Total average monthly income of the family is 550 Laris. 

Enver requested credit for purchasing fertilizers for the cornfields. After the fertilizing he will get more and higher quality corn and he will be able to sell more of it. It will increase the income of the family. Enver and Isolda plan to use the increase in income for a house renovation.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for the cornfield.

loans.name: Amistad Y Lucha Group

texts.es:
LA SRA. MARITZA ANGELICA, ES SOCIA DEL GRUPO "AMISTAD Y LUCHA", ES SOLTERA Y SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE ROPA EN UN PÚESTO QUE ALQUILA EN UN MERCADO UBICADO EN LA ZONA DE BELAUNDE EN EL DISTRITO DE COMAS.
ELLA INCIÓ SU NEGOCIO CON POCA MERCACDERIA QUE OFRECIA A SUS AMISTADES, LUEGO SE LE PRESENTÓ LA OPORTUNIDAD DE ALQUILAR UN LOCAL EN UN MERCADO MUY CONCURRIDO, FUÉ AHI QUE OBTENIENDO UN PRESTAMO DE EDAPROSPO PUDO INVERTIR EN SU PEQUEÑO PUESTO Y POCO A POCO IR CRECIENDO. HOY EN DÍA CUENTA CON UN PUESTO MUY SURTIDO, CON VARIEDAD DE ROPA PARA DAMAS, CABALLEROS Y NIÑOS.
UNA DE SUS METAS ES PODER ADMINISTRAR SU PROPIA BOUTIQUE.
texts.en:
Sra. Maritza Angelica is a member of the group “Amistad y Lucha” (Friendship and Struggle). She is single and earns her living by selling clothes from a rented stall at a market in the Belaunde area of the District of Comas.

She started her business with little merchandise. Maritza began selling to friends and was later presented with the opportunity to rent a stall at a very busy market. At that point, she obtained a loan from EDAPROSPO to invest in her small business and has gradually grown over time. Today she has a well-stocked business and offers a variety of clothes for women, men, and children.

One of her goals is to manage her own boutique.

loans.use: to buy clothing so that she can increase her inventory.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es: La señora Nelly se dedica a la confección de calzados para toda edad y su esposo es profesor en un colegio; de esta forma ambos consiguen los ingresos que tiene para mantener  a su familia. El crédito lo necesita para comprar materia prima como ser: cuero, plantillas, suelas, clefa y demás, pues ha conseguido un contrato grande para confeccionar 36 pares de tennis, 48 pares de calzados de mujer y 36 pares de calzados para hombre. Es casada, tiene dos hijos y vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona de Tembladerani de la ciudad de La Paz. El crédito anterior que obtuvo y el crédito actual, ambos han sido canalizados a través de Kiva Y Nelly se encuentra muy satisfecha.
texts.en:
Sra. Nelly makes shoes for all ages and her husband is a high school teacher. Both of their jobs provide income by which they can support their family. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy raw materials such as leather, insoles, soles, adhesive, and other supplies. Nelly was awarded a large contract in which she must make 36 pairs of tennis shoes, 48 pairs of women’s shoes, and 36 pairs of men’s shoes. She is married and has two children. Nelly lives in her own home in the District of Tembladerani in the city of La Paz.

Just like her previous loan, this request is being referred to Kiva for funding. Nelly is very pleased.

loans.use: to buy leather, insoles, soles, adhesive, and other supplies for making shoes.

loans.name: Ursula Consuelo

texts.es: La Sra. Úrsula, quiere tener una mejor condición de vida y por ello ha venido trabajando muchos años para conseguirlo; su principal negocio es la venta de cosméticos de las marcas BELCORP, AVON, UNIQUE Y LEONISA; ha trabajado así por más de 11 años, su principal sueño es ser la vendedora que mas haya vendido en la ciudad de Ica, el crédito lo va a invertir para una necesidad personal que es la construcción de una pared en su casa por seguridad. La Sra. Úrsula está muy agradecida por el crédito otorgado.
texts.en:
Sra. Úrsula wants to have better living conditions, so she has worked many years in order to achieve this goal. Her main business involves selling cosmetics of various brands such as Belcorp, Avon, Unique, and Leonisa. Úrsula has worked in this business for more than 11 years. Her main wish is to be the most successful sales representative in the city of Ica.

Her loan will be invested in a personal expense, the construction of a wall in her house for safety reasons. Sra. Úrsula is very grateful for the loan that has been provided.

loans.use: to build a wall in her house.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: El señor Roberto se dedica a la venta de artículos de plástico (como jarras, bañadores, basureros, etc.) en una tienda de su propiedad. El crédito lo requiere para adquirir mayor cantidad de bañadores, baldes y demás artículos para el hogar, pues tiene mucha demanda. Vive en casa en propia la misma queda ubicada en la zona de  Villa Armonía de  la ciudad de La Paz, es casado y tiene seis  hijos. Roberto es cliente de IMPRO desde el año  2009 y su historial de pagos es muy bueno.
texts.en:
Sr. Roberto sells plastic goods such as containers, wash basins, garbage cans, and other items. He has his own store. The loan he is requesting will be used to acquire a large quantity of wash basins, buckets, and other household items that are in high demand. Roberto lives in his own home in the District of Villa Armonía in the city of La Paz. He is married and has six children.

Roberto has been a client of IMPRO since 2009 and has a very good payment history.

loans.use: to acquire a large quantity of wash basins, buckets, and other household items.

loans.name: Merab

texts.en:
Merab is 50 years old. He lives in the village of Gomi, Imereti Region, West Georgia. Merab is unmarried and lives with his 86 year old father and 53 year old sister. Merab’s father is retired. His sister has health problems and gets the relevant pension from the government. Merab is the only income provider in the family. 

Merab manages the dairy farm, which consists of 4 milk cows. Merab produces, on average, 60 kg of cheese per month. He sells it at the local open market. The family also has a pig and sells 10-12 piglets per year. Along with the above-mentioned, Merab grows maize on the family owned plot of the land. Part of the harvested corn is used for feeding the cows and the other part is sold locally. The total average income of the family, including the pensions for Merab’s father and sister is 950 Laris. 

Merab has requested credit for expansion of the existing cattle-shed and construction of a hen-house. In the near future, he plans to increase the amount of cows on the farm, as well as to buy about 10 hens. 

After implementation of the set plan, Merab will sell more cheese, as well as eggs, the income of the family will increase and they will be able to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for expansion of the existing cattle-shed and construction of a new hen-house.

loans.name: Manuel Gerardo

texts.es: Manuel es un joven de 23 años, vive en compañía de su madre y sus hermanos en la casa de sus padres. Su gran entusiasmo y sus deseos de emprender lo llevaron a tomar una decisión importante en su vida para generarse ingresos, es así que con apoyo de sus padres y sus ahorros abrió un restaurante  en su casa. La gran ventaja en su negocio es que esta ubicado  cerca de una institución publica que son sus principales consumidores, además de ser chef profesional que garantiza la calidad de las comidas. Fruto del crecimiento de su negocio se  refleja  en el aumento de clientes y por esta razón contrato la mano de obra de 2 personas que le ayudan en la atención de su negocio, tiene muchas proyecciones para el futuro, una de ellas es tener una cadena de restaurantes y fuente de soda en su ciudad y comenzando por ese sueño se empeñara por lo pronto en mejorar en implementar su restaurante. Es la primera vez que esta trabajando de manera conjunta con MFP, su necesidad de mejorar su negocio es la primordial razón para decidirse a solicitar un crédito y aunque sea una experiencia nueva para Manuel se compromete a ser puntual en sus pagos. Con el dinero comprará  un letrero luminoso para su negocio y más cubiertos.
texts.en:
Manuel is a young man who is 23 years of age. He lives at his parents’ house with his mother and siblings. His enthusiasm and initiative led him to make the important decision in life to generate an income for himself. With the support of his parents and his savings, he opened a restaurant in his house. The great advantage of his business is that it is located near a public institution where the employees are his main customers. Being a professional chef also guarantees the quality of his meals. The growth of his business has resulted in an increase in the number of customers. For this reason, he has hired two employees to help manage the business. Manuel has many plans for the future, one of them being the establishment of a chain of restaurants and a soda fountain in the city. His dream has just started, so for now he will focus on improving the operation of his restaurant.

This is his first time working with MFP. Improving his business is the main reason Manuel decided to request a loan. With this new experience, he promises to complete his payments on time. The money will be used to buy a neon sign for his business and more cutlery.

loans.use: to buy cutlery and a neon sign for his restaurant.

loans.name: Khatuna

texts.en:
Khatuna is from the village of Patardzeuli, Kakheri Region, East Georgia. She is 35 years old, married and lives with her big family: her husband, Manuchar, their 10 year old son, 3 year old daughter and her parents. Khatuna’s son goes to school. 

Khatuna and Manuchar lead the agricultural business of the family. They own a poultry farm with 1200 hens. She sells the poultry in Tbilisi (capital city of the country), at an open market, to the poultry retailers. The family also owns a 400 sq meter greenhouse, where cucumbers are grown. Harvested cucumbers are also sold at the same market, to the green grocery retailers. 

Khatuna has requested credit to purchase feed for hens. She will buy quality feed for the farm in order to get good poultry. In the near future, Khatuna plans to reinvest part of the received profit in the development of the poultry farm. This will help to increase the amount of hens in the farm and provide more profit for the well being of her children and the entire family.

loans.use: to purchase feed for hens.

loans.name: Bendicion De Dios Group

texts.es: La señora Juana tiene 41 años, pertenece al banco comunal Bendición De Dios Ella es una mujer trabajadora y muy activa ella tiene su negocio que es la venta de recargas, desde hace 21 años dice que emprendió ese negocio para estar más al pendiente de sus hijos. Ella está pidiendo un crédito para comprar recargas y aumentar la demanda de sus clientes. A pesar de las dificultades que atraviesa como es que le amputaron una pierna ha sabido sobresalir con esta dificultad. Los otros nueve integrantes se llaman Maria Petrona, Maria Isolina, Ana Francisca, Abrahan, Maura Del Socorro, Anita Magali Geronima Nicolasa ellos invertirán su crédito que les están otorgando en diferentes negocios.
texts.en:
Sra. Juana is 41 years old and a member of the Communal Bank “Bendición de Dios” (Blessing of God). She is an active and hardworking woman who has a business selling rechargeable phone credits. Juana says that she started this business 21 years ago because she was more aware of the needs of her children. She is requesting a loan to buy rechargeable credits because of the increased demand from her customers. Juana has been able to succeed despite the difficulties she has faced, including the amputation of a leg.

The other members are Maria Petrona, Maria Isolina, Ana Francisca, Abrahan, Maura Del Socorro, Anita Magali, and Geronima Nicolasa. They will invest their loans in different businesses.

loans.use: to buy rechargeable phone credits.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es: El Sr. Jaime es soltero, vive en la casa de su hermano que se la ha dado a cuidar; él se dedica a prestar el servicio de transporte urbano en una moto taxi alquilada, el Sr. Jaime se levanta muy temprano para realizar su trabajo ganando a la semana S/. 300 nuevos soles, los cuales los utiliza para su sustento diario y así poder salir adelante. El crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de su propia moto. Su principal sueño es poder algún día comprarse su auto para prestar el mismo servicio. El Sr. Jaime está muy agradecido por el crédito otorgado.
texts.en:
Sr. Jaime is single and lives at home with his brother who is dependent on him. He provides urban transportation services using a rented motorcycle taxi. Sr. Jaime wakes up very early in order to do his job. He earns 300 PEN per week and uses the money to pay for his daily needs so that he can move forward.

His loan will be invested in the purchase of a motorcycle taxi of his own. His main wish is to someday buy an automobile to use in his service business. Sr. Jaime is very grateful for the loan that has been provided.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Pucaray De Huancalle Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PUCARAY DE HUANCALLE”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Pisac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la señora Marleni; la socia es soltera y tiene 26 años de edad, la socia tiene 1 hijo; la socia trabaja elaborando anticuchos , los cuales los vende en las tardes hasta altas horas de la noche, la socia compra carne de vacuno en buenas cantidades los cuales los troza y los condimenta con especies que las pasa una por una en numero de 4 pedazos de carnes y en la punta del palito llamado brocheta insertar una papa cocida, esta es cocinada en una parrilla y acompañada de un preparado especial llamado uchucuta, en quechua y en castellano seria rocoto molido con especias. Lo cual es vendido por unidades a partir de las 6 de la tarde hasta las 12 de la noche. La socia requiere el préstamo para invertir en la compra de carne y de ingredientes, mas en la compra de un par de sillas plásticas para mejorar la atención e incrementar su pequeño negocio, la venta es en la esquina comercial de su barrio, en la parte de la vereda ella se instala todas las tardes de forma ambulatoria y a la intemperie. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de carne, especias, sillas de plástico para los clientes.

Los otros socios del banco se dedican a la venta de verduras, venta de hortalizas, venta de comidas de forma ambulatoria, venta de productos secos, crianza de animales menores, como cuyes, chanchos, aves de corral. Otros socios se dedican al transporte.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “PUCARAY DE HUANCALLE” community bank. The bank is located in the district of Pisac in the district of Pisac, province and department of Cuzco.   

The members name is Marleni. She is single and 26 years old and has 1 son. She makes "anticuchos" [kebobs] which she sells in the evening until late at night. She buys beef in large quantities which she cuts up and seasons with spices. She places four pieces of meat on a skewer with a cooked potato and grills it to serve with a side dish called "uchucuta" in Quechua, ground rocoto pepper with spices. She sells from six  in the evening until 12 at night. She needs the loan to invest in buying meat and other ingredients. She also needs to buy a couple of plastic chairs to improve her service in grow her small business. She sells on a commercial corner of her neighborhood on the sidewalk. She sets up every afternoon and sells as a street vendor outdoors. She needs the loan to invest in buying meat, spices, and plastic chairs for her customers. 

The other members of the bank sell vegetables and herbs, are street vendors of food, sell dry goods, raise small animals such as guinea pigs, pigs, and poultry. Others work in transportation.

Marleni is grateful for the support that has been given to her and she is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to invest in buying meat, spices, and plastic chairs for her customers.

loans.name: La Alegria Group

texts.es:
El comité denominado La Alegría, es D. la ciudad D. San Lorenzo, está integrado por 15 mujeres D. la misma ciudad. Todas son trabajadoras, unidas, que trabajan dentro D. un ambiente D. cooperación y mutuo respeto. Desean generar un poco mas D. ingresos con lo cual podrán paliar los gastos que surgen día a día en las casas D. cada una. El objetivo del comité no es solo desarrollar a las miembros en el ámbito económico, sino también personal.
La señora Lucia se dedica a la venta D. ropa usadas. Por medio D. este trabajo ella ha podido salir adelante y generar los recursos que necesita para poder paliar los gastos que día a día surgen. Una D. sus metas es tener un local donD. ofrecer sus ropas y D. esa forma cumplir con la demanda D. sus clientes.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. prendas D. segunda mano para la posterior venta. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le brinda, ya que D. obtener el crédito le será D. gran ayuda.
texts.en:
The communal bank named 'La Alegría' (The Happiness) is from the city of San Lorenzo. It is comprised of 15 women from the same city. All of the women are hard working and united, who work within an environment of cooperation and mutual respect. They wish to generate a bit more income to cover the costs that arise day by day in each of their homes. The objective of the committee is not only to develop their members financially but also personally.

Lucia sells used clothing. Through this work, she has been able to get ahead and generate the resources needed to cover her daily household expenses. One of her goals is to have a venue where she can sell her clothes and in this way meet the demands of her customers.

She is asking for this loan to buy second hand clothing for resale. Lucia is thankful to the Fundación for the opportunity that it is providing for her, since receiving this loan will be of great help to her.

loans.use: to purchase second hand clothing for resale.

loans.name: Jessica

texts.es:
La Sra. Jessica pertenece al Banco Comunal “Las Aguerridas II”, del Distrito de Tarapoto, Provincia  y Departamento de San Martín. Es conviviente, de 32 años de edad y tiene 03 hijos, las dos mujeres tienen 11 y 6 años, estudiantes de nivel primario, y el niño de 3 meses de nacido.
Empezó con un inicial de S/.300.00 nuevos soles, vendiendo jugos de frutas por las mañanas de forma ambulatoria en la puerta de su casa, dejó de  realizar esta actividad por encontrarse en riego de perder a su último bebé, es así como decide,  posteriormente vender productos de primera necesidad (abarrotes). 
Se encuentra muy satisfecha con el ingreso que le generan sus ventas. Actualmente cuenta con clientes fijos, moradores de la zona y familiares, todo gracias al trato y amabilidad que les brinda.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/. 2500.00,  piensa comprar productos que tienen más salida para implementar su negocio como golosinas, bebidas gaseosas, sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, cajas de leche, aceites en litros, carnes, verduras y otros.
Jessica es una mujer trabajadora, su sueño es que su negocio este bien surtido, está muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por brindarle la oportunidad de mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Jessica is a member of the communal bank "Las Aguerridas II" of the district of Tarapoto in the province and department of San Martin. She is married common-law, 32 years old and she has 3 children. Her daughters are 11 and 6 and they attend primary school. Her son is 3 months old. She started out with an initial fund of S/.300 nuevos soles used to start a business selling fruit juices in the mornings, traveling from door to door. She had to stop her business because she was at risk of losing her baby. She then decided to start selling basic consumer goods (grocery store products).

Her is very satisfied with the income that she earns through her sales. She has a roster of steady clients including passers-by in the region and family members, and it is all thanks to the good customer service and kind manner in which she receives them.

With this new loan in the amount of S/.2500 she plans on purchasing the products that sell the best to supply her business. She will purchase snacks, soft drinks, sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, boxes of milk, cooking oil, meats, vegetables, and other products.

Jessica is a hardworking woman whose dream is to have a well-stocked business. She is very thankful to the Manuela Ramos movement (Kiva Field Partner) for providing her the opportunity of improving her income.

loans.use: to purchase snacks, soft drinks, sacks of rice, and sacks of sugar.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
La Sra. Maribel pertenece al Banco Comunal “Las Aguerridas II”, del Distrito de Tarapoto, Provincia y Departamento de San Martín. Es conviviente, tiene 28 años y 02 hijas de 04 y 02 años de edad, estudiantes de nivel inicial.
A los 20 años empezó a  trabajar como secretaria en una institución, tuvo su familia e hijas y dejó el trabajo  para dedicarse a su hogar, por iniciativa propia y con el apoyo de su pareja, decide vender ceviche con mariscos (plato típico de la región) en su casa.  Su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 Nuevos soles. Actualmente ofrece su producto  a familiares, amigos, vecinos y público en general, poco a poco fue ganando más clientela y está muy contenta.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/. 1700.00, comprará  más insumos como pescados y mariscos, sacos de yuca, sacos de papa, sacos de choclos, sacos de camotes, sacos de cebolla, sacos de limones y así para preparar sus platos exquisitos y muy agradables.
Maribel es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora,  su sueño es tener su restaurante de pescados y mariscos, está muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por brindarle la oportunidad de seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Maribel is a member of the communal bank "Las Aguerridas II" of the district of Tarapoto in the province and department of San Martin. She is married common-law and she is 28 years old. She has 2 daughters, aged 4 and 2 and they are in preschool.

When she was 20 years old she became employed as a secretary in an institution. She formed a family and she had her daughters and she quit her job to take care of their home. Under her own initiative and with her partner's support she started out selling ceviche (a traditional seafood dish of the region) from her house. Her first loan was in the amount of S./300 nuevos soles. She currently sells her product to her family, friends, and neighbors and to the general public. Gradually she has earned more clientele and she is very happy.

With this new loan in the amount of S/.1700 nuevos soles she will purchase more ingredients such as fish, seafood, sacks of yucca, sacks of potatoes, sacks of corns, sacks of sweet potatoes, sacks of onions, and sacks of lemons. This way she will be able to prepare her exquisite and very pleasant recipes.

Maribel is an achieving and enterprising woman whose dream is to have fish and seafood restaurant. She is very thankful to the Manuela Ramos movement (Kiva Field Partner) for providing her with the opportunity to keep growing.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as fish and seafood, sacks of yucca, sacks of potatoes, sacks of corn, etc.

loans.name: Otilia

texts.es:
La Sra. Otilia, pertenece al Banco Comunal “Las Aguerridas II”, del Distrito de Tarapoto, Provincia y Departamento de San Martín. Está casada, tiene 53 años y 01 hijo de 20 años, estudiante de nivel superior en Economía.
Hace 6 años trabajaba como empleada doméstica en diferentes casas, el tiempo transcurría, se sentía cansada y no se daba tiempo para su familia, es por ello y por iniciativa propia que decide dedicarse a la venta de ropa.
Con su préstamo inicial de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles otorgados por el Movimiento Manuela Ramos,inicia su negocio de venta de ropa de segunda mano.  Nos ceunta que le va muy bien en sus ventas ya que lo  realiza en las afueras de la ciudad, cuenta con clientes fijos. Actualmente incrementó su negocio con la venta de blusas, pantalones, faldas y zapatos para damas, haciéndose de una muy  buena clientela. Este negocio le da muy buenas ganancias y le brinda muchas satisfacciones.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/ 1,500.00, comprará más vestidos, blusas, pantalones, polos, faldas de segunda, y zapatos de diferentes modelos y marcas.
La Sra. Otilia es una mujer trabajadora y entusiasta,  su sueño es aumentar su stock de prendas de vestir de primera calidad en marcas y modelos, de esa manera generar mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Otilia is a member of the communal bank "Las Aguerridas II" of the district of Tarapoto in the province and department of San Martin. She is married, 53 years old, and she has a 20-year old son. He is attending post-secondary education specializing in economics.

For the past 6 years she has been working as a janitor in various houses. But with the passage of time she felt tired and she did not have any time to spend with her family. For this reason and under her own initiative she started out selling clothing.

Her first loan was in the amount of S/.300 nuevos soles, granted by the Manuela Ramos movement (Kiva Field Partner). She started out her used clothing sales business. She tells us that is has done very well especially because she carries out her sales outside of the city. She has a steady roster of clients. She has increased her business by incorporating the sale of blouses, pants, skirts, and ladies' shoes. This has earned her a very good clientele. This business provides her with a very good income and it provides her with great satisfaction. 

With this new loan in the amount of S/. 1000 nuevos soles she will purchase more dresses, blouses, pant, polo shirts, used skirts, and shoes in various models and brands.

Otilia is a hardworking and enthusiastic woman whose dream is to have an inventory of top quality clothing of popular brand names and styles to improve her income.

loans.use: to purchase used clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es:
La Sra. Nelly pertenece al Banco Comunal “Los Eucaliptos”, del Distrito de Tarapoto, Provincia y Departamento de San Martín. Está casada, tiene 43 años y 02 hijos, la mayor tiene 22 años y es estudiante de nivel superior en contabilidad, y el menor tiene 11 años estudiante del nivel primario.

Es una mujer muy activa, dedicada a atender a sus hijos.  Motivada por una amiga, se inicia en la venta de productos de belleza con un capital de S/ 300.00 nuevos soles, actividad que en la actualidad incrementó, ahora cuenta con una variedad de productos como perfumes, colonias, talcos, desodorantes, cremas para la piel, y otros.  Cuenta con clientes Fijos, quienes están muy satisfechos por la diversidad de productos.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,800.00 nuevos soles comprará productos de belleza para su stock como: perfumes para damas y caballeros, cremas faciales, shampoos para adultos y niños, polvos compactos, talcos,  lápices labiales, delineadores de ojos y cejas, esmaltes de uñas, además de otra vitrina para exhibir  sus productos.
Nelly es una mujer  soñadora, se siente muy contenta y quiere continuar trabajando para la realización de sus suieños. Está muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por ayudar a mujeres como ella a tener oportunidades de desarrollarse en el medio donde se desenvuelven.
texts.en:
Sra. Nelly belongs to the “Los Eucaliptos” communal bank in Tarapoto District, San Martin Province and Department. She is married, 43 years old and has 2 children: the older is 22 and is a college student in accounting and the younger is 11 and in elementary school.

She is a very active woman, dedicated to caring for her children. Encouraged by a friend, she started to sell beauty products with a working capital of 300 nuevos soles, a business that nowadays has expanded. At present she has a variety of products such as perfume, cologne, talcum powder, deodorant, face creams and others. She has loyal customers who are very satisfied with the variety of her products.

With this new loan of 1,800 nuevos soles, she will buy a supply of beauty products such as perfume for women and men, facial cream, shampoos for children and adults, compact powder, talcum, lipstick, eye and eyelash liner, nail polish as well as another display case for her products.

Nelly is a woman full of dreams. She is very happy and wants to continue working to realize her dreams. She is very grateful to Movimiento Manuela Ramos / CrediMUJER for giving women like herself the opportunity to develop within their own environment..

loans.use: to buy cosmetics: perfume for women and men, facial cream, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Maria Elsa

texts.es: La señora Maria, es habitante del municipio de Masaya, junto a su esposo e hijas, los planes hacia un futuro es mejorar las condiciones de vida y apoyar siempre en sus estudios a sus pequeñas ya que su sueño es verlas realizadas con una carrera profesional, doña Maria desde hace varios años labora como laboratorista en un hospital  , la mayor dificultad que se le presenta es que no cuenta  con un salario suficientemente alto , para poder comprar de un solo vez  la cerámica y materiales de construcción  que necesita para una  pequeña bodega que quiere  construir ; ya  que si logra esto tendría más espacio en su casa de habitación ya que su         sala tiene muchas herramientas de trabajo.Agradece el apoyo que le brinda Afodenic atravez de fondo kiva .
texts.en:
Maria lives with her husband and daughters in the Masaya municipality.  Her plans for the future are to improve their living conditions and to always support her little ones’ education.  Her dream is for them to have professional careers.

For several years Maria has been working in a lab at a hospital.  The greatest difficulty that she has is that her salary is not high enough.

She wants to be able to purchase, all at once, the tile and construction materials that she needs.  The materials are for a small grocery store that she wants to build.  If she does this she will have more space in her house; there are a lot of work tools in her living room.

She is grateful for the support Afodenic has provided through a Kiva loan.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Efia

texts.en:
Efia has worked in the skincare business for over fifteen years. She works at a spa in New York City where she has been employed for over eight years. Her passion for skincare and her creativity led her to create her own line of skin products three months ago. Although she is excited about the line and the products, she knows that she will need more inventory to increase sales and ultimately to continue to support herself. Efia is working on her line while working full-time at the spa so that she can obtain the capital to invest into her new business. 

With this loan from ACCION USA, Efia will be purchasing inventory for her skincare line. She knows that greater inventory will increase her booking of shows and heightening sales in a competitive industry.

loans.use: to purchase inventory for her skincare line.

loans.name: Banco Comunal Corazon De Jesus Group

texts.es: El Banco Comunal Corazón De Jesús nace con el propósito de mejorar sus actividades. Este grupo fijaron como objetivo principal el crecimiento de cada una de ellos, tanto social como económicamente, todas ellos son reconocidos en el lugar. Dominga es una mujer emprendedora e innovadora, ella se dedica a una pulpería,  Ella es una mujer muy sacrificada, pues cuenta que todos los días se levanta a muy tempranas horas de la mañana para ir a comprar sus productos. Ella dice que con el correr del tiempo ya tiene una clientela bien formada. Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de granos básicos, golosinas, refrescos, detergentes entre otros. También los otros integrantes del grupo tienen sus negocios y quieren el financiamiento para invertir en sus negocios.
texts.en:
The “Corazón De Jesús” (Heart of Jesus) Communal Bank was born with the intention of improving their business activities.  This group set their main objective to be the growth, as much social as economical, of each one of them.  All of them are recognized in their area.

Dominga is an enterprising and innovative woman; she has a general store.  She is a very self-sacrificing woman.  Every day she gets up in the very early hours of the morning to go buy her products.  She says that with the passing of time she now has a good customer base.

She is requesting the loan to buy basic grains, sweets, soft drinks, and detergent, among other things.

The other members of the group also have businesses, and they want the loan to invest in their businesses.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, sweets, soft drinks, and detergent, among other things.

loans.name: Lili

texts.en:
Lili is from the village Martkopi, Kartli Region, East Georgia. She is 53 years old, married and lives with her family: her husband, Guram, and two sons (25 and 21 years old). 

Lili has a milk cow. She sells the milk in Lilo (a nearby village) open market. Her income is 200 Laris per month. Lili’s sons are workers at a scrap-iron store-house. Each of them gets a salary of 100 Laris per month. The total average income of the family is 400 Laris per month. 

Lili requests credit to renovate her kitchen. When she renovates the kitchen, she will be able to make yogurt from the milk, sell it and get more income. Lili plans to save the income to purchase an additional milk cow to get more milk and dairy products. This will increase the family income and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to renovate a kitchen to be able to produce yoghurt

loans.name: María Isabel

texts.es:
Maria es muy emprendedora, tiene 50 años y en la actualidad vive con sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. Ante la necesidad  de afrontar las múltiples necesidades de su hogar, decidió  emprender su negocio en la rama que mas le agrada y también para apoyar a su esposo porque ha tenido que trabajar  a una zona muy lejana de la ciudad donde radica actualmente. Desde hace 20 años estuvo capacitando incluso en programas sociales enseñando  tejer a diversas mujeres, el buen prestigio que posee en el área de los tejidos a mano le ha servido para  tener desde hace un año su tienda de venta de lanas  en las cuales vende las lanas por madejas. María también  enseña a sus clientes  y esta es su estrategia para captar su clientela y mantenerse con ella. por lo general atiende por las mañanas, disfruta de su trabajo porque realizar los tejidos es un pasatiempo  además que realizar este negocio le resulta rentable en sus ingresos  es por es lo que  quiere hacer crecer su negocio.
Es la novena oportunidad que esta solicitando un crédito de manera grupal con MFP, sus cualidades de liderazgo en su grupo  infunden ánimos a las demás integrantes para seguir cumpliendo puntualmente con las cuotas de crédito que afrontan en  cada mes. Con este crédito seguirá comprando mas mercadería para su tienda.
texts.en:
Maria, age 50, is a very enterprising woman.  She now lives with her three children in her own house.  Facing the need to handle the many household necessities, she decided to undertake a business in the area that pleases her the most.  She also wanted to support her husband because he has had to work in a zone that is very far away from the city where they live.

She has been training for 20 years.  This includes social programs teaching various women to knit.  The good reputation that she has in the field of handmade knitting has served her in getting her store selling wool.  She has had the store for one year, and she sells by the skein.  María also teaches her customers, and that is her strategy for getting her customers and having them stay with her.

She generally sees to her business in the morning.  She enjoys her work because knitting is a pastime.  Also, being in this business is profitable in its earnings.  That is why she wants to grow her business.

This is the ninth loan she has requested in a communal way with MFP.  Her leadership qualities encourage the other members of her group to continue making their monthly loan payments punctually.  She will use this loan to continue buying more merchandise for her store.

loans.use: to continue buying more merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Djatugbé

texts.fr:
Djatugbé est une femme âgée de 43ans. Elle est marié å un transitaire. Elle a 03 enfants en charge.  
Djatugbé travaille comme revendeur de produits d’alimentation générale et de charbons de bois depuis 2005. 
Elle vend à domicile. Elle achète au Grand Marché de Lomé. 
Djatugbé a requis son second cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des produits d’alimentation générale et des charbons.
texts.en:
Djatugbé, 43, is married to a forwarding agent and is raising three children. She has been working selling groceries and charcoal since 2005. She sells out of her home. She buys her goods at the Grand Market in Lomé. 

Djatugbé has requested her second loan from WAGES in order to buy grocery products and charcoal.

loans.use: to buy groceries and sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Moussiliyatou

texts.fr:
Moussiliyatou est une femme âgée de 31 ans. Elle est mariée å un commerçant et a 01 enfant en charge.
Moussiliyatou travaille comme revendeuse de plastiques depuis 2008. Elle vend à ses clients dans un quartier de la place et achète les ustensiles à Lomé et à ACCRA. 
Moussiliyatou a requis premier  son cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des sceaux, des gobelets des glacières et des plats.
texts.en:
Moussiliyatou, 31, is married to a small-scale retailer and is raising one child. She has been working at selling plastics since 2008. She sells to her customers in a local neighborhood and buys the utensils in Lomé and ACCRA. 

Moussiliyatou has requested her first loan from WAGES in order to buy buckets, glasses, ice chests, and platters.

loans.use: to buy pails, ice chests, and platters.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy haberdashery and sewing supplies.

loans.name: Yaovi Augustin

texts.fr:
Yaovi Augustin est un homme âgé de 31 ans. Il est marié å une couturière. 
Yaovi Augustin travaille comme un tapissier depuis 2007. Il fabrique les meubles et revend à ses clients à Agoé après achat des planches, des mousses  du cuir et de la colle à LOME. 
Yaovi Augustin a requis son premier  cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des outils de travail
texts.en:
Yaovi Augustin, age 31, is married to a seamstress. He has worked as an upholsterer since 2007. He makes furniture and sells it to his customers in  Agoé after buying planks, foam rubber, leather, and glue in LOME. 

Yaovi Augustin has requested his first loan from WAGES in order to buy tools for his upholstering business.

loans.use: to buy tools for his upholstering business.

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.fr:
Mohamed est un homme âgé de 28 ans. Il est marié et a 02 enfants en charge.
Mohamed travaille comme vendeur de pneus depuis 1996. Il vend ses produits  à Agoé après achat au Port Autonome de Lomé. 
Mohamed a requis son premier cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des pneus.
texts.en:
Mohamed is 28 ans, married, and raising two children. 

Mohamed has worked selling tires since 1996. He sells his products in Agoé after buying them at the Autonomous Port of Lomé. 

Mohamed has requested his first loan with WAGES in order to buy tires.

loans.use: to buy tires.

loans.name: Emprendedores De Vitarte Group

texts.es: El grupo Emprendedores de Vitarte, está conformado por la unión de varias mujeres emprendoras. Todas las integrantes del grupo desarrollan distintas actividades de forma conjunta y solidaria, dentro de un ambiente de compañerismo, respeto y unión. La señora Pilar es una de ellas, tiene 42 años, es casada y con 6 hijos, cinco son menores de edad y dependen de ella y de su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de Yogurt hace diez años, con esta venta genera los ingresos que pueden pagar los gastos que se da día a día en su hogar, como la compra de la comida, y de los gastos de colegio que paga mensualmente. Con el reciente préstamo ella quiere formalizar y registrar su pequeño negocio y estar en regla con sus documentos y más adelante formarla como una empresa.
texts.en: The communal bank Emprendedores de Vitarte is comprised of various women entrepreneurs.  All of the members of the group are involved in different businesses but form a united, supportive group within an atmosphere of friendship, respect and union.  Mrs. Pilar is one of the members.  She is 42, married and has six children, five of whom are minors and live with her and her husband.  She has been selling yoghurt for ten years which has allowed her to cover the daily household expenses, such as groceries and monthly school expenses.  With this loan she wants to formalize and register her small business so she will have the documents to establish a company in the future.

loans.use: To formalize her business.

loans.name: 2 De Junio Group

texts.es:
El comité 2 de Junio nace hace más de tres años mediante la gestión y el apoyo de otro comité que se encontraba trabajando en dicho lugar. Este comité es de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, en estos más de dos años de intenso trabajo han crecido tanto social como económicamente, son reconocidas en el lugar como mujeres muy trabajadoras.
Ellas se definen como mujeres muy trabajadoras y luchadoras, desean lo mejor para sus hijos y familiares, es por eso que luchan de forma incansable.
La señora Mirtha se dedica a la venta de bebidas desde hace ya mucho, gracias a su intenso trabajo ha logrado salir adelante y ha ido creciendo de forma paulatina. Entre sus sueños está poder aumentar la dimensión de su negocio ya que de esa forma podrá aumentar su capacidad de almacenaje. Comenta que es muy conocida en el barrio por su buena atención, es en los fines de semana que ella tiene mucha demanda.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de cervezas, whiskys, vinos y demás para abastecer su negocio. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le da.

loans.use: Compra de cervezas, vinos, whiskys y demás para la posterior venta.

loans.name: Yamileth Del Rosario

texts.es: La señora Yamileth, es habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe, junto a su pequeño hijos, los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones  de vida  , con el primer financiamiento logro realizar mejorías en la parte delantera de la vivienda , ahora quiere realizar una división , ya que actualmente lo que divide entre la sala y el cuarto son sabanas y no goza de privacidad , doña Yamileth , labora en una casa privada , el cual su salario no le permite realizar de una sola vez compra de  materiales de construcción , agrade Afodenic que atrávez de los fondo Kiva  personas de bajos recursos  puedan logran sus sueños de tener una vivienda justa .
texts.en: Mrs. Yamileth lives in the town of Ticuantepe with her young children and her plans are to improve their living conditions.  With the first loan she received she was able to make improvements to the front part of her house.  Now she wants to build a wall to divide the living room and bedrom, since there is only a sheet separating the two which does not allow for privacy.  Yamileth works in a private house and her salary is not enough for her to buy the construction materials all at once.  She is grateful to Afodenic for the Kiva fund which helps low-income earners realize their dreams and have a dignified dwelling.

loans.use: To buy construction materials.

loans.name: Banco Comunal Victoria De David Group

texts.es: Este Banco se llama Victoria de David. El grupo está conformado por 9 integrantes y es la segunda vez que solicitan un préstamo. La señora Juana se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general, tiene dos hijo de 11 y 7 años bajo su cargo. Inicio hace 3 años por cuenta propia, ya que necesitaba un medio de ingreso para brindarle apoyo a su familia. Solicita el préstamo para comprar materia prima como sabanas, pintura de labios, pinturas de uñas, polvos y cremas. Con las ganancias quiere poder crecer su negocio y completar una mini fabrica. Los otros integrantes del grupo tienen sus actividades económicas que por medio del financiamiento le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en: This communcal bank is called Victoria de David.  The group is comprised of nine members and this is their second request for a loan.  Mrs. Juana sells general merchandise.  She has two children, ages 11 and 7 under her care.  Three years ago she started her own business because she needed to earn an income to help support the family.  She is requesting a loan to buy sheets, lipstick, nail polish, powders and creams.  With her earnings she wants to expand her business and build a mini-factory.  The other members of the group will use the loan to help boost their businesses.

loans.use: To buy sheets, lipstick, nail polish, powders and creams.

loans.name: Juana Del Carmen

texts.es: La señora Juana, es habitante de Ticuantepe. Junto a su esposo e hijos, los planes hacia un futuro es mejorar las condiciones de vida , tiene  una hija a su cargo los demás ya son casados e independientes , doña Juana tiene varios años que se dedica al comercio , actualmente vende frutas y verduras en el mercado de Managua , la mayor dificultad que se le presenta son las alzas de los productos y perdidas en algunas ocasiones del mismo , agradece Afodenic que atrávez de los fondos Kiva poco a poco va comprando materiales de construcción para terminar su humilde vivienda .
texts.en: Mrs. Juana lives in Ticuantepe with her husband and one daughter who is still in her care.  She has other children who are married and independent. Her plans are to improve their living conditions in the future.  Juana has been a vendor for several years and currently sells fruit and vegetables at the market in Managua.  Her greatest difficulty is overcoming the rise and fall of product prices which can cause losses.  She is grateful to Afodenic for the Kiva fund that  helps her, little by little, buy the construction materials she needs to finish her humble dwelling.

loans.use: To buy construction materials.

loans.name: Herminia Elizabeth

texts.es:
La  Señora  Herminia tiene 34 años de edad y es madre soltera de un hijo menor .Ella trabajo desde muy joven con su madre y su tío; con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación logro independizarse y montar su propio negocio desde hace 6  años .
Herminia tiene una despensa, que es su medio de subsistencia. Ya tiene una clientela bien formada en los alrededores del barrio donde vive. Con este trabajo logro construir su pequeña vivienda y darle la educación necesaria a su hijo. Lucha día a día por su hijo, ya que el es su mayor motivación a seguir adelante. Le gustaría poder ampliar su negocio, con lo cual podrá ofrecer más variedad de productos a sus clientes y de esa forma cumplir con la demanda de los mismos.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de comestibles, panificados, lácteos, bebidas y demás para el abastecimiento de su local. Está muy esperanzada con el crédito ya que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Sra. Herminia is 34 years old and a single mother with a young son. She had been working with her mother and her uncle ever since she was a young girl. With great effort and dedication, she was able to become independent and establish her own business six years ago.

Herminia has a food pantry which enables her to support herself. She has a well-established customer base from the surrounding areas of the neighborhood where she lives. Through her work, Herminia was able to build a small house and provide her son the necessary education. With great motivation, she and her son strive each day to move forward.

Herminia would like to expand her business so that she can offer a wider variety of products to her customers and meet their demands. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy food products, baked goods, dairy products, beverages, and other items to restock her food pantry. She is extremely hopeful that this loan will be a great help.

loans.use: to buy food products, baked goods, dairy products, beverages, and other items.

loans.name: Leoncio De Maria

texts.es:
Don Leoncio comerciante ambulante con mas de veinti seis años en las ventas,junto a su esposa han venido mejorando su vivienda, el cual labora de conserje, y que como objetivo ha sido la construccion total de su casa.
Es a travez de Afodenic, que comenzo a construir,el cual ha avanzado mucho, teniendo un techo mejor para sus dos hijos, estudiantes.
Con este nuevo prestamo  levantara pared, ya que mitad es de concreto y mitad de tabla, eh ir poco a poco cerando de concreto.
Su objetivo es poder cerrarla completamente, a si como seguir aumentando su inventario en su pequeño negocio
texts.en:
Don Leoncio is a street vendor who has been in business for over 26 years and also works as a concierge.  He and his wife have been able to make some home improvements but their goal is to finish construction.

With loans through Afodenic he was able to begin construction, which has advanced considerably, and the house now has a better roof for his two children who are in school.  With the new loan he plans to build a wall of concrete and wood, which eventually will all be concrete.  He plans to finish construction and increase his inventory for his small business.

loans.use: To buy construction materials to build a wall with concrete and wood.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es:
Doña Sabina de profesion docente, con varios años de trabajo, madre de tres hijos que con esfuerzo y apoyo de su esposo han logrado dar educacion. El labora en mantenimiento de computacion.
Sabina ha venido mejorando su vivienda, con el credito que Afodenic ha dado atravez del financiamiento, anterior logro hacer la cocina, que a un faltan detalles que espera seguir haciendo. Hoy con este nuevo financiamiento podra mejorar la infraestructura del baño, en donde hara division  con puerta corredizas, techo y pared. 
El cual esta contenta, por dar mejores condiciones de higiene y seguridad a sus hijos.
texts.en: Doña Sabina is a teacher by profession, with many years of experience.  She is the mother of three children, whom she has succeeding in educating, with the effort and support of her husband.  He works in computer maintenance.  Sabina has been working on improving their home. With the loan that Afodenic previously financed, she was able to do the kitchen, although there are still some remaining details that she hopes to continue to work on.  Now with this new loan, she will be able to improve the infrastructure of the bathroom, so that there will be sliding doors, a roof and walls.  What makes her happy about this is that she will be able to provide better hygiene conditions and safety to her children.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to finish her bathroom

loans.name: Los Palmares Group

texts.en:
Monica is the coordinator of her group Los Palmares (The Palms). Her group is located in the urban slums surrounding Santo Domingo and is composed of twenty businesspeople. Monica and the 19 other members are taking loans for their businesses.

Monica requires a loan to buy fabric, thread and haberdashery items to make blankets, bedding sets and curtains. This is Monica´s second loan with Esperanza International. She will take a step toward improving her business by investing this loan to increase her services and sales.

She has had her business for 9 years. She lives in a simple home with her 3 children. She is a single mother working like a man to proviD. for her family. Her most difficult challenge was raising her children. She is a hard-working woman. Monica enjoys taking care of her children.

She says that her favorite thing is to sew. She will uses her profits to save because she needs to buy a plot of land to build her house. Monica dreams of having her own house.

Monica and her group are thankful for your support!

loans.use: to buy fabric for curtains, blankets and quilts

loans.name: Claudia Andrea

texts.es: la Señora Claudia es cliente nueva de la institución vive en la zona de Cota Cota en la casa de sus suegros los cuales le dieron unas habitaciones por las niñas, ella tiene dos hijas las cuales mantiene sola ya que se separo de su marido porque le trataba bien  de esa forma se separo y obtuvo la movilidad para la manutención de sus hijas ya que recibe una renta diaria, la señora Claudia es una mujer muy trabajadora ya que en las tardes se dedica a la actividad de niñera con una familia de la zona de los Pinos, La Sra. Claudia además tiene una micro empresa  con la cual exporta artesanías  a Dinamarca como ser manillas  y collares de plata y otras pequeñas artesanías que le solicitan recién esta incursionando en esta actividad y el crédito que esta solicitando es para la compra de plata para los collares que le pidieron ya que recién es su segundo envió a Dinamarca.
texts.en:
Claudia is a new client of this institution. She lives in the Cota Cota zone in the house of her in-laws, who provide residence for her and her daughters. Claudia has 2 daughters whom she maintains completely, since separating from her husband who treated her well. She moved out in order to obtain the mobility to support her daughters and earn a daily income.

Claudia is a hard-working woman who is employed afternoons, offering child care to a family that lives in the Los Pinos zone. In addition, Claudia has her own micro-enterprise that exports artisan crafts to Denmark, including silver bracelets and necklaces, as well as other small artisan goods, to fill orders. She began this activity recently and the loan she requests is to buy silver for necklaces that have been ordered. She just sent her 2nd order to Denmark.

loans.use: buy silver to make artisan crafts to sell abroad.

loans.name: Claudia Carolina

texts.es: La señora Claudia es una pequeña agricultora del municipio de Ticuantepe , junto a su esposo e hijos , los planes hacia un futuro es poder mejorar las condiciones de vida y darle estudios a sus pequeños , doña Claudia desde hace varios años se dedica al cultivo de piña la mayor afectación que se le presenta es que no cuenta con un capital para darle mantenimiento ya que este carece de fertilizantes e insumos necesarios para una producción , Agradece el apoyo que le brinda Afodenic  atrávez de fondo Kiva ya que sin este apoyo muchos agricultores perderían su plantación por no contar con un recurso económico  como el que brinda Kiva .
texts.en: Claudia is a small farmer in the municipality of Ticuantepe with her husband and children.  Her future plans are to be able to improve her living conditions and provide schooling for her little ones.   For several years Claudia has been farming pineapple.  Her greatest challenge is not having enough capital to provide crop maintenance because she lacks fertilizer and supplies needed for production.  She is grateful for the help Afodenic provides through Kiva funds because if it weren’t for this support many farmers would lose their crops for not having economic resources like Kiva provides.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and supplies.

loans.name: Mujeres Alegres Group

texts.es:
Las mujeres del presente comité son D. la cuidad D. Caacupé. Son muy trabajadoras, y unidas, realizan actividades diversas como grupo, D. eso modo fomentar la integración D. todas las miembros del comité. 
Las Señoras están muy agradecidas con la Fundación Paraguaya, porque gracias a la institución pueden acceder a constantes capacitaciones, y ahora también capacitaciones para con sus hijos; con eso enriquecen sus conocimientos y ayudan al sustento D. sus hogares. El comité acaba D. culminar el ciclo número 16
La presidenta, la Señora Florentina vive con su marido e hijos, ella se dedica a la costura. Gracias a su trabajo se hizo conocida por todo el barrio, con el mismo ha podido formarse una cantidad definida D. clientes, los cuales siempre solicitan su trabajo. Comenta que todo lo que realiza es por sus hijos y por su hogar, ya que D. esa forma genera ingresos que son útiles a la hora D. paliar los gastos D. la casa.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. telas, hilos, y agujas, que son indispensables para el ejercicio D. su profesión. Ella está muy esperanzada en el crédito, ya que le será D. gran ayuda.
texts.en:
The women in this committee are from the city of Caacupé. They are very hardworking and together. They carry out different group activities thus encouraging the integration of all the committee members.

The ladies are very grateful to the Fundación Paraguaya because thanks to this institution they have access to constant training and now, training for their children as well. Through this they are enriching their knowledge and helping to maintain their households.The committee has just completed its 16th loan.

The president, Florentina, lives with her husband and children. She sews for a living. Through her work she has become well known in the neighbourhood, something which has also helped her to develop a steady customer base, who always request her services. She says that everything she does is for her children and her household. Making an income in this way helps to alleviate the household expenses. 

She is requesting the loan to buy fabric, thread and needles all of which are essential in her profession. She very much hopes to receive the loan as it would a great help to her.

loans.use: to buy material, thread and needles for use in the sewing workshop.

loans.name: Maria De Lourdes

texts.es:
Doña Maria es comerciante, desde hace trece años, vende comida en un cafetin que junta a su hermana trabaja, su esposo labora como cadete de taxi, siendo de su propiedad. Ha logrado vender variedad de platillos de comida gracias a prestamo que Afodenic ha dado, en varios ciclos.
Para ella es de gran sastifaccion haber salido adelante al trabajar, para apoyar a su familia. Hoy en dia necesita el financiamiento para el cambio de techo de su casa, es de cuartones y zinc, en donde pondra perlines,el cual ira parte por parte ya que todo esta ah altos costos y tiene que equilibrase para surtir el cafetin tambien.
Materiales a comprar laminas de zinc, perlines, golosos entre otros para hacer la obra.
texts.en:
María is a merchant.  For the last thirteen years she’s been selling food in a snack bar that she runs with her sister.  Her husband works as a taxi driver; he owns the taxi.  She has managed to sell a variety of dishes thanks to the loans that Afodenic has given her during several cycles.

For her, it’s very gratifying to get ahead trough work to support her family.  Today, she needs the loan to replace the roof on her house, which is made of wood beams and zinc metal sheets.  She will install purlines section by section because costs are very high and she has to budget to also stock the snack bar.  She will buy materials like zinc metal sheets, purlines and screws, among others to do the project.

loans.use: to buy zinc metal sheets, purlines and screws to repair the roof.

loans.name: Roxana Yenny

texts.es: La señora Roxana es cliente antigua de la institución ella tiene tres hijos en edad escolar ella se dedica a administrar la movilidad que tiene con su esposo ya que el pertenece a  la línea de radio taxi, su esposo se dedica a la actividad de mecánica en la zona de Achachicala ella vive en la zona de bella Vista en su propia casa además también la Sra. Roxana a parte de administrar su movilidad, se dedica a la confección,  realiza costura para ayudarse con los gastos de la familia , y también realiza trabajos de limpieza en una casa particular cada dos semanas ya que la limpieza la realiza en una casa de una familia de militares y ellos viajan constante mente por lo cual su trabajo solo es eventual, es una persona muy trabajadora, el dinero del credito lo utlizara para el matenimiento de su vehiculo, en la foto la Sra. Roxana esta en compañia de su esposo.
texts.en:
Roxana is a longstanding client of the institution.  She has three school age children and she works administering the car she owns with her husband that is part of a radio dispatched taxi service.  Her husband works as a mechanic in the Achachicala neighborhood.  She lives in the Bella Vista neighborhood in her own house. 

Besides administering the car, Roxana is also a seamstress.  She sews to help out with family expenses and she also works as a cleaning lady in a private home every two weeks because the house belongs to a military family and they travel constantly so this work is only occasional.  She is a very hardworking person.  

She will use the loan money to service her vehicle.  In the photo, Roxana appears in the company of her husband.

loans.use: to service her car.

loans.name: Elmer Gonzalo

texts.es: El señor Elmer es cliente nuevo que  no presenta otros créditos en otras entidades el vive en villa Copacabana y su actividad es la venta de  vehículos en la zona sur y en la feria de la 16 de julio, en este momento solicita el crédito para el aumento de capital ya que se le presentó una oportunidad de un vehículo a la venta por ocasión la cual estamos apoyando a  realizar, el trabaja desde hace tiempo en esto de la compra y venta de los vehículos. El vive con su esposa  y sus dos hijos uno de ellos en edad escolar y el otro ya en universidad, su esposa y el muestran  responsabilidad motivo por el cual se solicita el financiamiento Kiva.
texts.en: Elmer is a new client who does not have any loans with other firms.  He lives in Villa Copacabana and he sells cars in the south part of town and at the 16 de Julio market.  At this moment, he’s asking for a loan to increase capital because an opportunity as arisen to buy a vehicle that’s for sale and we are helping him to do so.  He has been working for some time now in this car buying and selling business.  He lives with his wife and two children; one is school age and one is already at university.  His wife and he exhibit responsibility so this is why Kiva financing is being requested.

loans.use: pay for a car.

loans.name: Cristobla Evaristo

texts.es: El señor Cristóbal, es agricultor de la zona de Ticuantepe, junto a su esposa e hijos, los planes hacia un futuro es mejorar las condiciones de vida  , don Cristóbal desde hace muchos años se dedica a los cultivos de piña, la mayor afectación que se le presenta es que no cuenta con un recurso económico para inducir en tiempo y forma la plantación ya que si esto se aplica como debe realizarse saldría un cultivo rico en sabor , un buen tamaño y sobre todo su color natural .Agradece la confianza que le brinda Afodenic  atrávez de los fondo Kiva  ya con los financiamientos obtenidos , logro diversificar productos como el maíz , frijoles y arroz .
texts.en: Cristóbal is a farmer in Ticuantepe with his wife and children. His plan for the future is to improve living conditions.  Cristóbal has been farming pineapple for several years.  His greatest challenge is not having the economic resources necessary to start his planting in a timely and proper fashion because this has to be done properly if crop yields are to be tasty, of good size and, above all, of natural color.  He is grateful for the trust Afodenic has placed in him though Kiva funds.  With previous loans he’s already managed to diversify his products like corn, beans and rice.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and farming supplies.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
El Señor Francisco tiene 34 años de edad, está casado con la Señora Natalia    hace más de 9 años  y vive en su casa propia en la ciudad de Carapeguá, tienen 2 hijos en edad escolar.
Él empezó hace más de 25  años a tejer las tradicionales sobrecamas y hamacas,  las que  lleva a vender por zonas  de Luque. Este oficio aprendió de su padre ya que el mismo se dedicaba al mismo rubro y le enseñó todo lo que sabía. Gracias a su trabajo y esfuerzo  pudo comprarse dos motocicletas las cuales utiliza para realizar sus ventas, actualmente viaja en compañía de su esposa y juntos llevan a vender las artesanías de la zona a diversos lugares. Ya cuentan con clientela bien formada quienes gustan mucho de los productos que ofrecen. Comenta que trabaja arduamente por darle un buen futuro a sus hijos y a su esposa.
