Il propose dans sa petite cantines des habits, des chaussures, des lunettes et des chaines.Marié et père de trois enfants, tous élèves à l'école primaire, il supporte avec ses bénéfices modestes des charges d'alimentation, de santé , d'éducation en plus du paiement des factures d'eau et d'électricité.Pour augmenter son fonds de commerce, il sollicite un prêt de 200 000F pour acheter 2 douzaines de chaussures, 50 piéces d'habits , 10 montres et 10 chaines.Il ambitionne d'avoir un grand magasin de ventes en gros.
texts.en:
The borrower is a former peddler (street vendor). He sold his wares in the streets in three big towns in this country before settling in his present locality thanks to a first loan of 250,000 francs from UIMCEC. In his little shop he displays clothing, shoes, glasses, and chains for sale. 

Married and the father of three children, all enrolled in primary school, he uses his modest profit to cover food, health-related expenses, education, and also water and electricity bills. In order to grow his working capital, he is requesting a loan of 200,000 francs to buy two dozen shoes, 50 pieces of clothing, 10 watches, and 10 chains. His ambition is to have a big wholesale store.

loans.use: to buy two dozen shoes, 50 pieces of clothing, 10 watches and 10 chains.

loans.name: Daan   Dool Group

texts.fr: Le groupe "DANN DOOLE" est constitué de 5 femmewa. Pour faire face aux difficultés que vivent leurs familles respectives pour la satisfaction de leurs besoins sociaux de base (alimentation, santé, éducation), elles s'activent principalement dans le commerce de savon artisanale et industriel. Elles ont adhéré dans un grand groupe de solidarité, " mbotaay" qui compte  50 femmes et qui les appuient grâce à de petites subventions et de petits crédits revolving.Membres de l'UIMCEC depuis un an, elles sollicitent un prêt de 250 000F pour l'achat  de savon artisanale et de savon industriel. Le chef de groupe est marié et mère de 4 enfants; Son activité lui permet  de nourrir ses enfants et de satisfaire ses petits besoins. Elle ambitionne de louer une cantine au marché pour être plus proche de la clientèle.
texts.en:
The "DANN DOOLE" group is made up of five women. To deal with the problems their respective families face and cover their living expenses (food, health-related expenses, education) they work selling condiments, soap, and cooked food. They joined a larger solidarity group called "Mbotaay" which numbers 50 women and which helps them out with small grants and small revolving credits. 

Members of UIMCEC for one year now, they are requesting a loan of 250,000 francs to buy 5 cases of locally produced soap, and five cases of industrial soap. 

The leader of the group is married and the mother of four children. She has a little restaurant which permits her to feed her children and cover her minor expenses. Her ambition is to rent a shop in the market so as to be near her clientele.

loans.use: To buy locally made and industrial soap

loans.name: Amina

texts.en: Amina lives in Uganda. She is married and has 4 children, all of whom are in school. She also takes care of additional family members (her mother). Amina has a charcoal selling business. She has been in this business for 7 years and she works 7 days a week. Amina sells her products retail at the market. She has requested a loan of 400000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO which she will use to buy bags of charcoal. The main business challenges for Amina include thieves and seasonality. Her goals are to sell wholesale only and to buy a plot of land. Amina lives in a home that she rents; she has access to electricity and doesn't have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include rent, school fees and medication.

loans.use: To buy more bags of charcoal

loans.name: Niakh  Diarignou Group

texts.fr: « Niakh Diarignou » qui signifie « vivre à la sueur de son front » est le nom que porte ce groupe constitué de cinq femmes  mariées qui s'activent dans le commerce de produits alimentaires.Très tôt le matin, elles sont déjà sur pied.Les unes se rendent au marché central pour s’approvisionner en denrées et les autres dans leurs cantines situées devant leurs domiciles.Elles parviennent ainsi à satisfaire leurs propres besoins mais aussi à améliorer sensiblement l’alimentation de leurs familles.Le chef de groupe (qui tient le tissu teint) a une cantine devant son domicile pratique en plus la teinture.Elle est mère de 4 enfants et vit avec son mari.Le groupe sollicite un crédit de 250000F pour acheter des sacs de légumes et d'autres produits de consommation courantes (riz, huile...).Le chef de groupe ambitionne de faire des voyages de commerce dans le célèbre marché sous- régional de Diaobé, situé à l’est du pays, afin de diversifier ses produits.
texts.en:
« Niakh Diarignou » which means "living by the sweat of your brow" is the name given to this group of five married women. Very earL. in the morning, they are already up and about. Some go to the central market to buy staples and others to their little stores situated in front of their homes. They thus manage to satisfy their own needs but also to make considerable improvements in the nutrition of their families. 

The head of the group (who is holding the dyed cloth) has a shop in front of her home and she also dyes fabric. She is the mother of four children and lives together with her husband. 

The group is asking for a loan of 250,000 francs to buy sacks of vegetables, packages of soap, packages of perfumes, and "thioub" (localL. dyed) cloth. The leader of the group would like to travel to the famous sub-regional market of Diaobé, situated in the east of the country, so that she can diversify her products.

loans.use: to buy fabric

loans.name: Jhonny

texts.es: El sr. Jhonny el vive en la zona Busch y tercer anillo junto con sus dos hijos en la casa de su hermana el se dedica al transporte publico en su propio vehículo y a la venta de refrescos que reparte por distintas áreas de la zona del plan 3000 entregando a tiendas de barrios, locales, según el pedido,  es su segundo crédito en el cual ha demostrado un buen comportamiento de pago. El segundo crédito que esta solicitando es para comprar una heladera para su venta de refrescos y aumentar su capital de trabajo. El sr. Jhonny tiene pensando a futuro vender su vehículo para comprarse otro mas grande que le ayude a  aumentar su venta de refrescos.
texts.en: Jhonny lives in an area called Busch.  He lives together with his 2 children in his brother's house.    Jhonny works as a taxi driver and has his own vehicle.  He also sells soft drinks in various areas to local shops.   This is his second loan and he has demonstrated that he makes his payments on time.   He is requesting this second loan to purchase a refrigerator, as well as obtain more money to invest in his business.  In the future, Jhonny would like to sell his current vehicle, and purchase a larger one, which would help him expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es: La señora Gregoria tiene 7 hijos D. los cuales 4 son dependientes, su esposo el señor Enrique se encuentra en la localidad D. San Julián trabajando como albañil. La Sra.  Gregoria vive en la zona Plan 3000, la señora se dedica a la venta D. ropa hace aproximadamente 9 años en diferentes ferias D. la capital cruceña. El crédito solicitado es para aumentar su capital D. trabajo para comprar mercadería ropa D. temporada,  ya que disminuyo el capital que tenia a causa D. la inversión que realizo para la construcción D. la casa D. su hijo, le ayudo a construir su casita a su hijo, es una persona muy amable y trabajadora, se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Gregoria has 7 children, 4 of them are still dependent on her.  Her husband, Enrique, is working as a brick  layer in the town of San Julian.   Gregoria lives in a zone designated as Plan 3000, and for approximately 9 years now she has worked selling clothing in different markets around the capital.  The loan she is requesting will be used to purchase clothing for the upcoming season.  She used some of her existing capital to build a small home for her son.  Gregoria is a very amiable and hardworking woman, and she feels grateful for the support she receives from the communal bank.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for the upcoming season to sell to her customers

loans.name: Josefa Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Josefa, vive en la ciudad de León, tiene 36 años de edad, tiene dos hijos, ellas es comerciante, es dueña de una pulpería tiene 5 años de tenerla. Ella desde muy joven ha aprendido a ser comerciante a los 18 años ella vendía ropa, cosmético, verduras de manera ambulante por las calles de León. Con el tiempo se caso y junto con su esposo han venido luchando por mejorar su calidad de vida, tratando de sobrevivir atravez de su negocio.
Ella solicita el crédito para comprar inventario para su pulpería tales como arroz, azúcar, frijoles, aceite. De esta manera podrá mantener mas surtida su pulpería ofrecer de todo tipo productos que le demanden sus clientes.
Uno de sus proyectos más anhelados que ella tiene es convertir su pulpería en una Distribuidora de productos varios. Sus próximas metas son comprar freezer, comprar 2 estantes de vidrio y un estante de metal para colocar sus productos.
texts.en: Josefa lives in the city of Leon.  She is 36 years old and has 2 children.   Josefa is a businesswoman, and has owned a small shop for 5 years.   From the time she was very young, she learned about business, and at 18 years old she was selling clothing, cosmetics, and vegetables around the neighborhoods of Leon.   She has since married and together with her husband, they fight to improve the quality of life for their family, trying to survive through their business.   Josefa is requesting the loan to purchase more merchandise for her store,, such as rice, sugar, beans and cooking oil.  In this way, she can keep her store well stocked and be ready to meet the requests of her customers.    One of her future projects is to convert her small store into a distributor of various products.   Her future goals include buying a freezer, 2 glass show cases, and some metal racks to display the products.

loans.use: to purchase more merchandise for her small shop, such as cooking oil, rice, beans and sugar.

loans.name: Celedonia

texts.es: La clienta Celedonia dedicada a la venta de ropa en una  de las avenidas mas concurridas en la ciudad ella junto a su nietita salen por la tarde a vender las prendas que durante toda la semana ofrecerán  a la clientela que pase por esa zona, el lugar es concurrido mas por la noche y existe mas venta, es por eso que ambas se quedan hasta altas horas de la noche para poder tener un poco mas de venta y no irse con poco dinero de ganancia, la señora Celedonia debe de encargarse de su nietita ya que a su hija la mama de la nietita con la que vive falleció. El objetivo de la clienta es cuidar y hacer estudiar para así sacarla profesional, ya que ella es su única acompañante. El dinero del credito la utilizara para la compra de ropa de temporada.
texts.en: Celedonia sells clothes in one of the busiest streets of the city. Together with her little granddaughter they leave in the afternoon to sell the clothes that during the whole week they will offer to the clients that pass through this area. This area is busiest at nighttime and there is more opportunity to sell, and for this reason they both stay until the late hours of the night to be able to sell more and not have to leave with only a little bit of money. Celedonia is in charge of the little girl since her daughter, the mother of the granddaughter, passed away. The objective of this client is to care for and make sure the little girl studies so that she can be a professional, since she is her only companion. She will use the money from the loan to purchase the latest season of clothing.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for the upcoming season to sell

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan, un joven de 24 años de edad, es originario de Malpaisillo municipio de León, tiene un hijo de 3 años de edad, es el comerciante, dueño de una pequeña pulpería aunque el estudia su segundo año de la carrera de arquitectura. El empezó este negocio hace dos años y medio con ayuda de su hermano el lo motivo a tener su negocio propio y así ayudarse a pagar sus estudios universitarios y mantener a su familia. 
Requiere el préstamo para comprar productos tales como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, maíz, huevo, leche para surtir su pulpería. De esta manera podrá mantener surtida su pulpería de productos que demandan sus clientes, espera mejorar sus ventas.
Una de sus principales metas es convertir su pequeña pulpería en una gran distribuidora de alimento sin dejar atrás su carrera de arquitectura pero siendo su prioridad numero uno el bienestar de su hijo.
texts.en:
Juan, a 24 year old young man, is a native of Malpaisillo, in the municipality of León. He has a 3 year old son. He is a trader, owner of a small grocery store even though he's in his second year of studies for a career in architecture. He began this business two and a half years ago with the help of his brother. He motivated him to have his own business and help himself pay for his university studies and support his family.

He needs the loan in order to purchase products such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, corn, eggs and milk to stock his store. In this way, he will be able to ensure that his store is stocked with products that his customers demand. He hopes to improve his sales.

One of his main goals is to convert his small store into a big distributor of food without neglecting his architecture career. However, the wellbeing of his son is his number one priority.

loans.use: to purchase products such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, corn, eggs, and milk to stock his grocery store.

loans.name: Santiaga

texts.es:
La señora Santiaga es casada, tiene 59 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 6 hijos y ninguno de los cuales está estudiando, se dedica a la producción de zapatos para damas, inicio este negocio como operaria y ahora quiere hacer su propio negocio, hasta el momento lleva 10 años realizando este trabajo, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al mismo oficio.

Decide solicitar un préstamo para invertirlo en materiales para comprar pieles, charolina, pegamento, tiner, suelas, etc. en el futuro espera contar con maquinaria para aumentar su producción y obtener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Santiaga is married. She is 59 years old. She didn't have the opportunity to go to school. She has six children and none of them are studying. She is dedicated to making shoes for women. She began this business as a machine operator and now she wants to start her own business. Currently, she has ten years experience with this work. She counts on the support of her husband who is dedicated to the same job.

She decided to request a loan to invest in materials to buy leather, patent leathers, glue, paint thinner, soles etc. In the future, she hopes to have machinery to expand her production and obtain more income.

loans.use: to purchase material for shoes.

loans.name: Calos Alberto

texts.es:
Don Carlos labora como guarda de seguridad, en horas libres trabaja en soldadura, el cual ejerce desde hace varios años.
Su esposa tiene su pequeño negocio de venta de tortillas el cual apoya con los gastos del hogar. Y a sus tres pequeños hijos, la mejor es una niña.
El objetivo de ambos ha sido la mejora a su casa, en donde han venido mejorando para el bienestar comun de la familia. todas esta mejora la ha logrado con prestamos en Afodenic. 
Con este nuevo financiamiento pondra verja al porche y porton que no tiene aun, logrando la seguridad de su familia.
Comprara soldadura, hiero liso, tubos redondo, para poder hacer el trabajo,  que el mismo lo hace ahorrandose la mano de obra, siendo de gran beneficio para sus mejoras. Contento por que terminara la obra  y podra gozar de mas espacio.
texts.en:
Carlos works as a security guard. During his free time, he works in welding which he's done for many years. His wife has a small business selling tortillas which supports with the house bills and their three small children, the youngest of which is a girl. The objective of both has been to improve their house which they have been improving for the common wellbeing of the family. They have achieved all of these improvements through loans with Afodenic.

With this new loan, they will put up a railing on the porch and a gate that they don't have yet, for the security of the family. They will purchase solder, smooth iron, round tubes to be able to do the work so they can save on labor being a great benefit for their improvements. They are happy to finish the work and be able to enjoy more space.

loans.use: to purchase solder, smooth iron, and round tubes to close the porch and make a gate, making more space.

loans.name: Ivania Isabel

texts.es:
Ivania de 29 años de edad, vive en Chacaraseca una comunidad de León, esta casada, es madre de tres hijos, es comerciante, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, lleva 6 años dedicándose a este negocio. Inicio a los 23 años de edad con el apoyo de su esposo quien le enseño a como criar y vender cerdos este negocio lo tienen en su finca , cuando obtuvo su primer ganancia ella compro una manzana de tierra mas para utilizarla como terreno de siembra . 
Solicita el préstamo para  comprar cerdos de desarrollo y componer el establo para los cerdos. Con esta inversión podrá adquirir con más facilidad la compra de cerdos e invertir para acondicionar mejor el lugar para crianza de sus animales. 
Su meta próxima es sembrar maíz.
texts.en: Ivania is 29 years old and lives in Chacaraseca, a community in León. She is married and is a mother to three children. She is a trader. She is dedicated to raising pigs. She has been dedicated to this business for six years. She began when she was 23 with the support of her husband who taught her how to raise and sell pigs. She has this business on her farm. When she obtained her first earning, she bought one more block of land to use it as planting land. She is requesting the loan to buy pigs for development and build a barn for the pigs. With this investment, she will be able to acquire with greater ease the purchase of pugs and to invest in better conditions for raising animals. Her next goal is to plant corn.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and compose the barn for the pigs.

loans.name: Miguel Antonio

texts.es: El señor Miguel es cliente nuevo que vive en la zona de chasquipampa a una cuadra y media de la institución, vive con su esposa y su hijo que se encuentra estudiando, el Sr. Miguel se dedica desde hace bastante tiempo en elaboración de juegos y experimentos educativos, con su trabajo a participado también en ideas emprendedoras en Bolivia, también tiene su pagina web llamada ciencia fácil, por lo que se hace conocer y tiene pedidos del exterior y se promociona en colegios y universidades para la elaboración de sus productos tiene robots que el creo  y experimentos de todo tipo los cuales pudimos ver, sus experimentos los acompaña con material reciclable utiliza motores, censores de luz y otro tipo de materiales experimentales por otro lado su esposa trabaja como agente de seguros. El préstamo lo requiere para la compra de accesorios ya que tiene un pedido por mayor razón por el cual se solicita el financiamiento Kiva.
texts.en: Miguel is a new client who lives in the Chasquipampa neighborhood, a block and a half away from the institution.  He lives with his wife and their child, who is in school.  For quite some time, Miguel has been making educational games and experiments.  With his work he has also participated in entrepreneurial efforts in Bolivia. He has his own website called "Easy Science," where people can find out about his business and where he can take orders from outside the country.  He is promoting his products at schools and universities.  In order to make his products, he has robots that he creates, and we could see that he has all types of experiments.  His experiments come with recyclable materials and they use motors, light censors and other types of experimental materials.  Also, his wife works as an insurance agent.  He needs a loan to buy accessories, since he has an order which is the main reason why he is requesting this Kiva loan.

loans.use: to buy accessories and materials for an experiment

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es: La Sra. María tiene como actividad la venta de miel, la misma que compra por mayor para su posterior venta por menor, actividad que desarrolla todos los días de la semana, ella es una persona joven muy trabajadora su familia esta compuesta por su esposo quien también trabaja en una localidad cercana a la ciudad de la paz, y sus  tres pequeños niños que se encuentran en edad escolar,  el destino del crédito es para la compra de un puesto de venta en un mercado cercano a su casa para de esta manera poder trabajar en un lugar estable y así poder mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en: Maria has a business selling honey.  She buys the honey at wholesale to later sell at retail, an activity that she is involved in every day of the week.  She is a young, hardworking person whose family consists of her husband, who also also works in a place near the city of La Paz, and their three small school-aged children.  She will use this loan to buy a stall in the market close to her house so that in this way she can work in a stable place and have better earnings.

loans.use: to buy a stall in the market

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase materials such as fabrics of different designs and colors, elastic, zippers, etc.

loans.name: Bacilio

texts.es: Bacilio tiene 53 años, vive con su esposa y sus 3 hijos en su casa  propia en su tierra natal Hace 20 años hace planos  arquitectónicos porque es  arquitecto de profesión y es una de sus grandes pasiones. Siempre  realiza estos trabajos para  construcciones  de municipios  cercanos su localidad, es un profesional muy reconocido  de su zona que conocen de la calidad y vocación de su trabajo, otro negocio paralelo que tiene es la venta de cervezas y también la agricultura   de las cuales sus principales apoyos son sus hijos que le ayudan en el transporte y cuida de cada detalle en el  comercio que realiza, los servicios como arquitecto son rentables por lo que ha decidió implementar  y mejorar sus herramientas.  Es la sexta oportunidad que tiene un crédito con MFP, tiene la satisfacción de trabajar de hambrea  grupal con las personas que considera de su confianza porque en todo este tiempo han cumplido puntualmente con sus pagos.En esta ocasión su dinero lo invertirá en la compra de mas mercadería en cerveza.
texts.en:
Bacilo is 53 and lives with his wife and 3 sons in his own home on native soil.  For 20 years he has been doing architectural projects because he is an architect by profession and this is one of his greatest passions. He always works on buildings in towns near his place.  He is a widely recognized in the area where they know about the quality and professionalism of his work. Another parallel business he has is the sale of beer and also agriculture, where his sons are his principal helpers and assist with transportation and overseeing every detail of the businesses he runs. His work as an architect is profitable, therefore he has decided to update and improve his tool kit.

This is his sixth loan with MFP. He has the satisfaction of working with an amiable group of people whose confidence he has earned because in all this time he has always made his payments on time. He will use the money from this loan to purchase more beer merchandise.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of more beer merchandise.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: El Sr. Mario se dedica al oficio de jardinería hace mas de 10 años, trabaja podando árboles tanto de afuera como adentro de los domicilios, también hace mantenimiento de jardines y tiene contratos con empresas  importantes de la ciudad de Cochabamba, El Sr es casado y tiene 3 hijos de los cuales 2 son dependientes, su esposa trabaja vendiendo comida frente a una Cooperativa. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de una máquina podadora y el mantenimiento de sus otros instrumentos.
texts.en:
Mario has been a gardener for over 10 years.  He prunes tress both outside and inside homes.  He also maintains gardens and has contracts with important businesses in the city of Cochabamba. 

He is married with 3 children, 2 of whom are dependent on him.  His wife sells food in front of a Cooperative.  The loan he requests is to buy a pruning machine and to maintain his other gardening tools.

loans.use: to buy a pruning machine and with maintenance.

loans.name: Fanny Mercedes

texts.es:
Fanny de 32 años, esta casada, tiene un hijo de 10 años edad , ella estudio administración de empresas, pero es comerciantes, es dueña de una pulpería localizada en su casa de habitación, es originaria de León .  Ella inicio con su pulpería hace dos años este ha sido su primer negocio su esposo la apoyo con un pequeño capital que el aporto, la falta de empleo la motivo a poner su negocio empezó a vender productos comestibles después se amplio a vender ropa y cosméticos. Su hermana y su mama la ayudan a atender el negocio y su esposo aporta al hogar con lo que gana en el hospital donde el trabaja.
Requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería, como ropa, cosmético, granos básicos para su pulpería. Ella espera poder hacer crecer sus ventas, que le permitan mejorar las condiciones de su local, poder comprar más inventario que pueda vender. 
Su meta próxima es comprar 2 vitrinas de vidrio y 2 estantes metálicos donde puede poner su producto.
texts.en:
Fanny, age 32, is married and has a 10 year old son.  She studied business administration, but she is a merchant.  She owns a general store, which is located in her house.  She is from León.

She started her store two years ago.  This has been her first business, and her husband supports her with a small amount of money that he contributes.  The lack of work motivated her to set up her business.  She started selling food products, and she later expanded to sell clothes and cosmetics.  Her sister and her mother help her see to the business.  Her husband contributes to the household with what he earns from the hospital where he works.

She needs the loan to buy merchandise like clothes, cosmetics, and basic grains for her general store.  She hopes to be able to make her sales grow, which will allow her to improve the conditions of her locale.  She will be able to buy more inventory that she will be able to sell.

Her next goal is to buy two glass display cases and two metal shelves where she can place her products.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like clothes, cosmetics, and basic grains for her general store.

loans.name: Pamela

texts.es: La Sra. Pamela   tiene como actividad la venta de sándwiches, su labor empieza muy temprano primero en la elaboración de sándwiches en la compra de carnes, su negocio es ambulante, ella va a repartir sus sándwiches desde las 10 de al mañana, su labor es sacrificada porque ella tiene que ambular por las diferentes construcciones que existen por la avenidas de la zona de villa Fátima, su labor termina al medio día cuando termina de vender sus sándwiches, en la tarde se dedica al cuidado de su niña que tiene dos años aproximadamente en las mañanas el cuidado de su niña lo realiza su madre, su esposo y ella son un matrimonio joven, invertirá el crédito en la compra de insumos.
texts.en:
Pamela sells sandwiches.  Her work starts very early.  The first thing in making sandwiches is buying the meat.  She sells in an itinerant manner.  She goes to deliver her sandwiches starting at ten in the morning.  

Her work involves much sacrifice because she has to walk by the different constructions that are on the avenues in the Villa Fátima zone.  Her work ends at midday when she finishes selling her sandwiches.  

In the afternoon she takes care of her daughter, who is about two years old.  In the mornings her mother takes care of her daughter.

Pamela and her husband are a young couple.

She will invest the loan in buying supplies.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Tomasa Maria

texts.es:
La señora Tomasa Maria es casada, tiene 24 años D. edad, curso el tercer años D. educación básica, tiene 2 hijos 1 D. los cuales está estudiando, se dedica a la producción D. pantalones D. lona,  inicio este negocio como operadora para el negocio D. sus padres y hasta el momento lleva 5 años D. experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo D. su esposo quien se dedica al mismo trabajo.

DeciD. solicitar un préstamo para la ampliación D. capital D. trabajo, ya que va a comprar telas D. loba para poder confeccionar mas pantalones, espera en el futro contar con operarios para su negocio.
texts.en:
Tomasa Maria is 24 years old and married.  She has three years of basic education.  She has two children, and one of them goes to school.

She makes canvas pants.  She started this business as an operator for her parents’ business.  She has five years of experience so far.  She has her husband’s help; he does the same work.

She is requesting a loan to increase her working capital because she is going to buy canvas fabric to be able to make more pants.  She hopes that in the future she will have operators for her business.

loans.use: to buy canvas fabric.

loans.name: Cecilia Bernarda

texts.es:
Cecilia, es originaria de la ciudad de Chinandega pero vive en la ciudad de León , tiene 39 años de edad , esta casada, es madre de dos hijos, ellas es comerciante, es dueña de una pulpería y tortillería. Inicio con el negocio de venta de tortillas por tradición familiar pues antes su mama se dedicaba a hacer y vender tortillas y ella le ayudaba de esta manera aprendió este oficio y ahora es ella quien se hace cargo de la venta de tortillas puso una pulpería con ayuda de su esposo quien aporto capital para iniciar la venta, lleva dos años con este negocio de pulpería.
Solicito el préstamo para compra productos tales como maíz, azúcar, frijoles, arroz, aceite, frutas verduras para vender en su pulpería. Con esta inversión podrá tener productos suficientes para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, mejorar sus ventas. Ella espera que con la ganancia que obtenga pueda hacerla mejoras a su pulpería, comprar vitrinas y estantes par colocar sus productos.
texts.en:
Cecilia was born in the city of Chinandega but lives in the city of Leon. She is 39 years old, married, and the mother of 2 children. Cecilia is a merchant, the owner of a grocery and tortilla store. Her tortilla-selling business began as a family tradition – her mother had made and sold tortillas before her – and Cecilia, by helping her mother, learned the trade. Now, it is she who is in charge of the business. Cecilia has also installed a grocery store with the help of her husband who provided the capital. She has operated the grocery store for 2 years now.

Cecilia is requesting a loan to buy products such as corn, sugar, beans, rice, oil, fruit, and vegetables to sell in her grocery store. With this investment, she will have sufficient inventory to satisfy customer demand and improve her sales. With these earnings, she hopes to make improvements in her grocery store, purchasing show cases and shelves to display her products.

loans.use: buy products such as corn, sugar, beans, rice, cooking oil, fruit, and vegetables to sell in her grocery store.

loans.name: Hector

texts.es:
Héctor, tiene 37 años de edad, es originario de  San Antonio una comunidad ubicada en Yali municipio de Jinotega al norte de Estelí, es soltero, de oficio caficultor, su nivel de estudios básicos solo curso hasta el quinto grado de primaria. El inicio ayudando a su papa a la edad de 14 años, el limpiaba y cortaba café, aprendió a separar el buen grano del malo, esta actividad las hacia por las tardes ya que por la mañana estudiaba, pero después se dedico de lleno a la siembra y corte de café pues su padre ya no tenia recursos económico para seguir estudiando. Cuando cumplió 25 años obtuvo  5 manzanas de café propias fruto de su esfuerzo y arduo trabajo de tantos años. Ademas de dedicarse a la siembra de café, también tiene cultivos frijoles, su hermano le ayuda a sembrar, el desea que su producto se de a conocer en las grandes cooperativas de café de la ciudad.
Solicita el préstamo para sembrar 1 ½ manzana de café, pagar mano de obra y comprar insumos, abono. Espera sacar una buena producción con calidad y rendimiento. 
En sus planes esta ampliar sus siembras de frijoles y cultivar 6 manzanas de café. Su meta próxima es comprar una motocicleta para que su hermano se traslade a ver los cultivos y agilizar loas tramites para la siembra y comercialización.
texts.en:
Hector is 37 years old, and was born in San Antonio, a community located in Yali municipality, Jinotega, north of Esteli. He is single and cultivates coffee. He only studied in primary school up to 5th grade. 

Hector began helping his father at the age of 14. He cleaned and harvested coffee, learning to separate good coffee beans from bad. He performed this activity afternoons, after studying in the morning. Later, he dedicated himself full time to sowing and harvesting coffee, because his father lacked the economic resources for Hector to continue his schooling. When Hector reached the age of 25, he was given 5 manzanas (3.5 hectares) of planted coffee land of his own, the fruit of his own efforts and arduous work over all those years. 

Besides sowing coffee, Hector also cultivates beans. His brother helps him with planting. Hector wants his coffee to be recognized by the great coffee cooperatives of the city.

Hector is requesting a loan to plant 1 ½ manzanas (105% of a hectare) of coffee, pay laborers, and buy inputs, especially manure. He hopes to have a good crop with quality and a high yield.

Among his plans are to expand his plantings of beans and cultivate 6 manzanas (4.2 hectares) more of coffee. His immediate goal is to buy a motorcycle to provide his brother with transportation to help him oversee the crops and facilitate the cultivation and selling process.

loans.use: to sow 1 1/2 manzanas (105% of a hectare) of coffee, paying laborers, and buying inputs and manure.

loans.name: Eli Isael

texts.es:
Eli, de 28 años de edad, es originario de la comunidad San Antonio ubicada en Yali municipio de Jinotega, esta casado, ella se dedica a la siembra de café , su nivel académico es básico solo curso hasta el sexto grado de primaria . Inicio a la edad de 17 años ayudando a su papa quien le  enseño a trabajar la tierra cuando el se caso su papa le dio 2.5 manzanas de tierras para que las trabajara, y fue cuando el empezó a sembrar  café por su propia cuenta, ahora lo hace en conjunto con su esposa. 
Requiere el préstamo para alquilar un beneficio de café (lugar donde secan, trillan, clasifican y almacenan café orgánico). De esta manera podrá mantener en buenas condiciones su café orgánico y venderlo a un precio justo que le genere ganancias.
El va a seguir sembrando una manzana más de café próximamente, y quiere sembrar tomate.
texts.en:
Eli, 28, is from the community of San Antonio located in Yali, Jinotega.  He’s married and dedicated to growing coffee.  He only finished elementary school going up to sixth grade.  He started helping his father when he was 17 years old.  His father taught him how to work the land and when he got married gave him 2.5 manzanas (Central American unit of land measure) of land for him to till.  That was when he started to grow coffee on his own.  Now he does it together with his wife.

He needs the loan to lease a “beneficio de café” (a place where organic coffee beans are dried, threshed, sorted and stored).  In this way he will be able to keep his organic coffee in good condition and sell it at a fair price that will generate profits.  He will add another manzana of coffee soon and also wants to plant tomatoes.

loans.use: to lease a "beneficio de café" (a place where organic coffee is dried, threshed, sorted and stored).

loans.name: Samiha

texts.en:
Samiha is from Madaba, Jordan. She is 49 years old and married with five children.

Samiha started her business selling accessories and toys years ago. However, since she couldn't leave her home for long hours she started to work from home.

Samiha is requesting a loan of 1,200 JD to purchase accessories and toys for her shop.

She is looking forward to increasing her stock so that she can increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase accessories and toys for the back-to-school and Eid (end of Ramadan) season.

loans.name: Fideya

texts.en:
Fideya from Madaba, Jordan is a 59-year-old divorced woman and a mother of three children.

Fideya makes pastries and desserts at home for sale, and is requesting a loan of 1,000 JD to purchase the supplies needed for make her goods.

Her hope is to open a productive kitchen in her home so that she will increase her sales and improve her family's standard of living. She helps her son in paying for the family's expenses.

loans.use: purchase raw materials for her baking business.

loans.name: Ely Yessenia

texts.es:
Ely, una joven de 28 años de edad, es originaria de San Antonio una comunidad ubicada en Yali municipio de Jinotega, es madre de un hijo, esta casada, cuyo nivel académico es básico, solo curso hasta sexto grado de primaria. Inicio en el negocio de la agricultura a los 19 años de edad, con ayuda de unas tierras que su madre le dio para que trabajara en ellas de las cuales hoy en día ocupa una parte para sembrar café orgánico con ayuda de su esposo ambos trabajan sembrando café. 
Ella requiere el préstamo para mantenimiento, compra de insumos y pago de mano de obra de siembra de café. Con esta inversión espera a darle un mejor mantenimiento a su siembra de café y obtener un excelente rendimiento en su cosecha.
Su siguiente paso es mejorar su vivienda , poner a estudiar a su hijos, mejorar sus siembras `para darle un futuro mejor a su hijo y dedicarse a otra de las actividades que mas le gusta la costura como otro medio de subsistencia.
texts.en:
Ely is a 28 year old young woman.  She is from the San Antonio community in the Yali municipality of Jinotega.  She has a son, and she is married.  She has a basic level of education.  She only attended school until the sixth grade.

She started in the farming business when she was 19.  She had the help of some land that her mother gave her to work.  She now uses part of that land to grow organic coffee.  Her husband helps her; they both work growing coffee.

She needs the loan for maintenance, to pay for supplies, and to pay for the labor of planting the coffee.  With this investment she hopes to give her coffee crop better maintenance and get an excellent yield from her harvest.

Her next step is to improve her house, to send her son to school, and to improve her crops in order to give her son a better future.  She will also do another business activity that she likes more.   She likes sewing as another way of making a living.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance, to pay for supplies, and to pay for the labor of planting the coffee.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam from Madaba, Jordan is a 48-year-old married woman and mother of three.

Mariam is selling home products from a room in her house. She is requesting a loan of 800 JD to expand her business and purshase more products.

Mariam is looking to sell her products via installments to increase her sales volume and income.

Her aspiration is to help her children continue their education.

loans.use: to expand her home products business by increasing her stock.

loans.name: Raeeda

texts.en: Raeeda is 31 years old and lives in Madaba, Jordan. She is applying for a loan for 400 JD to buy products to sell in her store. Her goA. for the future is to expand her store to include some additionA. nearby commerciA. space.

loans.use: to buy products to sell in her grocery store.

loans.name: Rehab

texts.en: Rehab is 50 years old and lives in Madaba, Jordan with her five children. Some time ago, she went into business selling products out of her house, but has since expanded to selling them from a bus owned by her husband. She is applying for a loan for 800 JD to buy more products to sell to her customers. Her goA. is to work with her husband to improve her family's living standards.

loans.use: to buy more products to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Foad

texts.en: Foaad is 64 years old and lives in Al Hashmi, Amman with his wife and two children. He makes a living by running a grocery store, and is applying for a loan for 1,500 JD to buy more products to sell to his customers. His goal for the future is to improve his family's life by expanding his store.

loans.use: to buy more products to sell to his customers.

loans.name: Anood

texts.en:
Anood from Madaba, Jordan is a 21-year-old single woman.

Anood is working at an accessories shop. She is requesting a loan of 400 JD to purchase fine quality perfumes and cosmetics so that she can book a stand at the shop to sell these products.

An aspiration of Anood's is to open her own cosmetics store.

loans.use: To purchase fine quality perfumes and cosmetics

loans.name: Eshtiyaq

texts.en:
Eshtyaq from Madaba, Jordan is a 48-year-old married woman.

Eshtyaq is working with her husband in the cultivation of simple plants.

Eshtyaq is requesting a loan of 500 JD to expand her project by buying more plants. She is looking to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase raw mterials and plants for her project

loans.name: Abd Al Razeq

texts.en:
Abd A. Razeq is a 33-year-old man from Bani Kenanah, Jordan and the father of three children.

Abd A. Razeq has a barber shop and he is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase appliances for his shop.

An aspiration of Abd A. Razeq's is to expand his business so that he can increase his family's income.

loans.use: To purchase appliances for his shop

loans.name: Ghadeer

texts.en:
Ghadeer from Irbid, Jordan is a 33-year-old woman.

Ghadeer is an embroidery expert and she works from home. 

Ghadeer is requesting a loan of 400 JD to purchase materials needed for her business. She is looking to improve her business and her family's income.

loans.use: To purchase raw materials

loans.name: Kawkab

texts.en:
Kawkab is a 42-year-old woman from Irbid, Jordan.

Kawkab sells cleaning products and cosmetics. She is requesting a loan of 700 JD to expand her business.

Kawkab wants to open her own shop instead of selling her products from home so that she can improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To expand her business by adding new product lines

loans.name: Reema

texts.en: Reema is 51 years old and lives in Bani Kenanah, Jordan with her husband and four children. In 1990, she opened a grocery store with a small amount of capital and has worked hard to expand it and get the necessary licenses. She is applying for a loan for 400 JD to buy more food products to sell to her customers. Her long-term goal is to earn enough money to expand and improve her house and buy her own store so that she no longer needs to pay rent.

loans.use: to buy more food items to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Khetam

texts.en: Khetam is 27 years old, single and lives in Madaba, Jordan. She earns a living by doing handcrafts, especially mosaics, and is applying for a loan for 500 JD to buy raw materials. She started her business at home but now works in a shop, and is looking to open her own store in the future.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for a mosaics business.

loans.name: Suzan

texts.en:
Suzan is a 24-year-old woman from Madaba, Jordan.

Suzan has her own grocery store and she makes sherak bread, a kind of traditionA. bread in Jordan.

Suzan is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase products for her store and some flour. She is looking to license her store and establish a place for doing the sherak bread.

Due to culturA. issues Suzan refused to publish her picture. thus, the woman in the picture is her uncle's wife.

loans.use: to purchase products for her grocery store.

loans.name: Laila

texts.en:
Laila is a 42-year-old married woman from Madaba, Jordan. She is the mother of six children.

Laila started her embroidery business from home years ago, and over time, she could provide it with machines. Now she is requesting a loan of 1200 JD to purchase materials needed for the project.

An aspiration of Laila's is to expand her project and purchase another sewing machine to increase the sales volume and her income, which will help her daughter in continuing her university education.

loans.use: To purchase raw materials.

loans.name: Brigida

texts.es: Brígida, D. 57 años, es una mujer alegre y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Eusebio D. 65 años y lo que más desea es vivir una vejez tranquila, ya que a su edad ya se dio el gusto D. formar y sacar adelante a sus 03 queridos hijos.Brígida, desD. muy joven empezó a ganarse la vida trabajando D. distintas formas, con el transcurso del tiempo conoció a su amado esposo quien la ayudo a concretar sus metas. DesD. entonces cuenta con su propio negocio, donD. se dedica a la venta D. ropas y su puesto esta situado en el lugar más conocido dentro D. la ciudad D. San Francisco, un pequeño mercado llamado “Gamarrita”.En este lugar atienD. a todos sus clientes con mucha amabilidad y cortesía, quienes la visitan continuamente, debido a los pulcros y novedosos modelos D. ropa que trae personalmente desD. la ciudad D. Lima. Lo que más le gusta D. su trabajo es aconsejar a sus clientas sobre las prendas que mejor las quedan, ya que D. esta manera se distrae un poco, lleva 30 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer D. pie todo el transcurso del día. Con el apoyo del crédito  comprará más ropas D. Lima, D. preferencia ropa D. verano, ya que este tipo D. ropa es la que más se venD. en esta parte D. la selva.Con el tiempo, desea poner una tienda más granD., en la cual pueda brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.Este será su séptimo crédito y se siente muy contenta D. saber que obtendrá un apoyo por parte D. los financistas, ya que así se sentirá segura D. comprar lo solicitado y esta dispuesta a devolver puntualmente sus aportes programados.Con los tres mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más ropa D. Lima, D. preferencia ropa D. verano, ya que este tipo D. ropa es la que más se venD. en esta parte D. la selva peruana
texts.en: 57 year old Brígida is a happy and hardworking woman who lives in her own house with her 65 year old husband, Eusebio. What she most wants is to live a peaceful old age as, at her age, she has already had the pleasure of raising her three beloved children. Brígida began earning a living when she was very young and worked in many different jobs. In the course of time, she met her dear husband, who helped her to realize her goals. Since then, she has had her own business selling clothes and her stall is located in the best know place in the city of San Francisco, a little market called "Gamarrita". In this place, she attends to her customers with much kindness and courtesy, and they visit her all the time because of the well-cut and fashionable clothes that she personally imports from Lima. What she most likes about her work is advising her customers about the clothes that will best suit them, as this is a good distraction. She has been running this business for 30 years and thinks that the most difficult thing is having to be on her feet all day long. With the support of this loan, she will buy more clothes in Lima, preferably summer clothes because that is what sells best in this part of the jungle. In time, she would like to open a larger store where she could offer a better service to her customers. This will be her 7th loan and she feels very happy to know that will have the support of the financiers as then she will feel safe buying what has been requested and she intends to make her repayments punctually. With the $1,100 she has requested, she will buy more clothes in Lima, preferably summer clothes because this is what sells best in this part of the Peruvian jungle.

loans.use: to buy more clothes from Lima, preferably summer clothing as this type of clothing is sold most in this part of the Peruvian jungle.

loans.name: Marina

texts.en:
Marina is single. She lives in Melitopol and sells jewelry in one of the local markets. She offers a wide variety of merchandise for sale in her vending location. Marina’s trade has grown a lot in the past four years. Presently, her monthly profit is about 4,000 Hryvnias.

Marina lives with her parents in a three-room apartment. Her fellow market vendors characterize her as an enterprising, sociable and hardworking person. Marina is seeking a loan of 18,000 Hryvnias to increase the assortment of inventory she offers for retail sale. She is hoping to continue developing her trade in the future and to see it flourish even more.

loans.use: to increase the assortment of inventory.

loans.name: Natalya

texts.en:
Natalya is married and has a 16 year old son. Natalya sells men’s and women’s clothing in the central market of Melitopol city. She has 10 years experience in this business. Her vending location is well equipped and clients like Natalya’s style of service and reasonable prices.
 
Natalya wants to increase the assortment of her stock for the coming fall season so, she has requested a loan of 20,000 UAH. With this additional merchandise, she hopes to generate extra profits and improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to increase her stock range for the coming fall season

loans.name: Anjelika

texts.en:
Anjelika is married with two daughters and lives in Melitopol where she owns a men’s and women’s underwear kiosk in the central marketplace. Anjelika, who launched her small enterprise 12 years ago, now has 25,000 Grivnyas worth of inventory and earns a monthly net profit of 6,500 Grivnyas.
 
Anjelika is seeking a loan of 20,000 Grivnyas to purchase assorted merchandise for sale in her kiosk. She is planning to continue developing her trade and re-investing in its further expansion. Anjelika is hoping to use a portion of the generated profit to improve her housing situation.

loans.use: to purchase assorted merchandise

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 23-year-old single young man. He lives in Rafah city in Gaza Strip located in Palestine. Ahmad has a photography studio and he wants to make some decorations and internal repairs in addition to purchasing new photography equipment such as cameras, picture developing machine, etc. However, Ahmad doesn't have enough money to pay, so he is in need of a loan from FATEN for $1,000.

When Ahmad takes the FATEN loan, which is repaid on a monthly basis, he will be able to pay for making decorations to the studio and have new photography equipment. Ahmad will work hard to generate more money, especially because he owns the only photography studio in the area where he lives. Ahmad's ambition is to become known and expand his work. Ahmad is photographed in his photography studio.

loans.use: To redecorate and repair the interior and purchase photography equipment

loans.name: Ut

texts.en:
Ut, 51, is the mother of two sons. Together with her husband and children, Ut lives in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband is now retired and the family depends on the income that Ut makes from selling groceries from her stall in a local street market. Ut began this business five years ago.

Every morning Ut buys common seasonal fruit and vegetables such as water morning glory, cucumbers, pineapples, beansprouts and cabbages to sell in her stall. Ut would like a loan to buy a greater variety and higher quality of fruit and vegetables so that she can attract more customers. 

Ut hopes that, through the loan, she will be able to increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy fruit and vegetables to increase her sales.

loans.name: Minh

texts.en:
Minh is a 48-year-old married woman with two daughters. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. For the past 24 years, she and her husband have run a food stall to cover all family living expenses and their children's education fees. The business is going smoothly and she would like a loan to buy new furniture, bowls and chopticks and better quality food and beverages to provide to her customers.

She hopes this will increase her income, help her to improve her living conditions and allow her to set aside some savings.

loans.use: To buy new furniture and better quality food and beverages for her food stall.

loans.name: Suong

texts.en:
Suong is a 51-year-old married woman with two children: one son and one daughter. She lives with her family in Ho Minh City. Her husband is a driver. 

For the past 25 years, Suong has supported her family by running a general shop in front of her house. She sells a large range of products from household items to personal use products.  

Suong would like to get a loan to buy new products such as many kinds of cakes, green tea, milk and beverages to sell in her store to better meet her customers' needs.

She hopes that she will be abL. to increase her income and set aside some savings through the loan.

loans.use: To buy cakes, green tea, milk and beverages for selling.

loans.name: Tiet

texts.en:
Tiet is 50 and married with two daughters. She lives with her family in Ho Minh City. Her husband works as a coordinator for a passenger van company. 

For the past three years, Tiet has supported her family by selling women's and children's clothes in a small market. This gives her a regular income to cover all family expenses and the children's education fees. 

Tiet would like to get a loan to buy a greater quantity and quality of clothes from wholesalers to sell in the market. She hopes that this will enable her to attract more customers.

She hopes that she will increase her income and help improve her family's living conditions through the loan.

loans.use: To buy more women's and children's clothes for selling.

loans.name: Thanh

texts.en:
Thanh is a 35-year-old married woman. She lives with her daughter and husband in Ho Chi Minh City. For 15 years, she and her husband have operated a food stall to sell meals for people in their community.

Thanh would like a loan to purchase new furniture, good quality food and rice in bulk. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her customers and attract additional customers. 

She also hopes that she will be able to increase her income and save money for any future difficulties facing her family through the loan.

loans.use: To buy new furniture, food and rice in bulk for her food stall.

loans.name: Uyen

texts.en:
Uyen is a 38-year-old married womA. with 2 daughters. She lives in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. 

Uyen and her husband have run a food stall in front of their house for the past three years. They sell steamed rice pancakes and pork pies.

She would like a loA. to expand her business by purchasing more furniture, cooking appliances and good quality ingredients. She hopes that this will enable her to increase turnover, earn a higher income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy furniture, cooking appliances and goods for her food stall.

loans.name: Van

texts.en:
Van, 38 years old, is married and has two children. She lives with her husband and children in Ho Chi Minh City.

Her husband earns money as a security guard for a market. Van supports her family with the income that she earns selling fruit, cakes and sweet soup. She intends to use her loan to buy more fruit and ingredients for production of her cakes and soup.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy fruit and ingredients for making and selling cakes and sweet soup.

loans.name: Dung

texts.en:
Dung is 37 years old and is married. She has 2 children and lives with them and her husband in Ho Chi Minh City.

Dung's husband earns money by sewing shoes. She earns an income to support her family by running a general store at her house. She intends to use her loan to buy many kinds of food to sell such as eggs, milk and confectionery.

She hope her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her family's living conditions and to save money for her children's education.

loans.use: To buy food like eggs, milk and confectionery to sell.

loans.name: Yen

texts.en:
Yen is 48 years old and is married. She has two sons and lives with them and her husband in Ho Chi Minh City. Yen and her husband earn an income by making and selling many kinds of cakes. They started this business eleven years ago.

Yen requires a loan to purchase a wide variety of cake frames and a better quality and quantity of ingredients and powders for production. She hopes that this will enable her to attract more customers and increase turnover. She also hopes that this will increase her family's income and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: To buy cake frames, ingredients and powder for production.

loans.name: Delia

texts.es: Delia, D. 54 años, es una mujer muy alegre y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Tito D. 54 años y sus 02 menores hijos, los cuales todavía dependen económicamente D. ella y lo que más desea es brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad D. vida.DesD. muy joven a Delia, le nació el gusto por las prendas D. vestir, es por eso que con el  correr del tiempo decidió dedicarse a la venta D. ropa, actualmente realizando una ardua labor semanal, lleva ropa para vender a distintas zonas aledañas del departamento D. Ayacucho y Cusco, ya que según manifiesta es ahí donD. mejores precios obtiene por sus prendas, las cuales ella misma se encarga D. comprar y transportar desD. la ciudad D. Lima.Lo que más le gusta D. su trabajo es mostrar a sus clientes las prendas que están D. moda en las distintas ciudades del Perú, ya que así siente que se gana la confianza D. sus compradores, lleva 33 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que transportar los pesados fardos D. ropa a distintas ferias, pero aun así no se da por vencida, ya que sabe que D. esta actividad depenD. el bienestar D. su familia. Con el crédito solicitado comprará más ropas por lo cual tiene que viajar a la ciudad D. Lima para traer los atuendos D. muy buena calidad y por ello espera contar con el apoyo D. los financistas. En lo futuro espera contar con la misma fuerza y por ello se encomienda al todo poderoso que la mantenga con salud para así trabajar con el mismo ímpetu que la caracteriza.Este es su segundo préstamo D. Delia y esta muy contenta D. saber que contará una vez más con el apoyo D. los financistas para seguir avanzando. En su banco comunal es una socia participe.Con los 3,000  nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más ropa.
texts.en: 54 year old Delia is a cheerful and hardworking woman who lives in her own home with her husband, 54 year old Tito, and their two youngest children who are still economically dependent on her. What she most wants is to offer her family a better quality of life. Since she was very young, Delia has had a taste for clothing. This is why, over the course of time, she decided to work selling clothes. She currently has a hard work week, taking clothes to sell in the different areas around the departments of Ayacucho and Cusco, as that is where she gets the best prices for her clothes. It is her responsibility to buy and transport her stock from the city of Lima. What she most likes about her work is showing her customers what is in fashion in the different cities of Peru, as she feels that this gains her the confidence of her customers. She has been doing this work for 33 years and thinks that the most difficult thing is having to transport heavy bundles of clothes to different markets, but, even so, she is not defeated as she knows that her family depends on her doing this work. She will use the loan she is requesting to buy more clothes, and she will have to travel to Lima to select good quality clothes and she hopes to be able to depend on the support of her financiers. In the future, she hopes to have the same strength, and so she has asked the Almighty to keep her in good health so that she can keep working with the impetus that characterizes her. This is Delia's second loan, and she is very happy to know that she can count on the support of her financiers once more. She is an active member of her community bank. She will use the $1,100 she is requesting to buy more clothes.

loans.use: to buy more clothes

loans.name: Dionisia

texts.es: Dionisia, natural de la ciudad de San Francisco de 37 años, es una mujer alegre y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Rómulo de 39 años y sus 02 querido hijos Jover de 17 y Pamela de 10 años, quienes son el motivo de todos sus esfuerzos.Con el único deseo de sacar adelante a su familia, Dionisia se embarca semanalmente a distintos distritos de la zona del Valle Río Apurimac, llevando fardos de ropa para vender en las diferentes ferias que se realizan en las zonas aledañas del los distritos en mención, las prendas que vende las compra de la ciudad de Lima, motivo por el cual son rápidamente compradas, ya que están confeccionadas de telas nacionales e importadas.Ella es una persona muy atenta, ya que siempre recibe a sus clientes cordialmente dispuesta a ayudarles en sus compras para que así puedan estar satisfechos, el trabajo lo cumple en compañía de su pareja donde llevan trabajando 09 años. Con el dinero del crédito comprará ganchos y andamios para exhibir mejor sus prendas.Con el tiempo, desea abrir una tienda en la ciudad de San Francisco, donde pueda atender mejor a sus clientes.Este será su tercer crédito y ya se siente contenta al saber que en esta oportunidad también contará con el apoyo financiero para llevar consigo  su propósito, además se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas puntualmente como solía hacer en los anteriores créditos.Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más ropa de la ciudad de Lima, con lo cual implementara mejor su stock de ventas.
texts.en: Dionisia, a native of the city of San Francisco, is 37 years old, and is a cheerful and hardworking woman. She lives in her own house along with her 39 year old husband, Rómulo, and their two beloved children: 17 year old Jover and 10 year old Pamela, who are the reason for all her efforts. With the sole goal of improving things for her family, Dionisia sets off each week to different districts in the Valle Río Apurimac area, carry bundles of clothes to sell in the different markets that are held in the aforementioned areas. She buys the clothes that she sells in the city of Lima because she can make quick purchases there and because she can buy domestic and imported brands. She is a very attentive person who always receives her clients cordially and wants to help them with their purchases so that they will be satisfied. She does this work with her partner, and they've been working together for 9 years. She will use the money from the loan to buy hooks and rails to better display her clothes. In time, she would like to open a shop in the city of San Francisco where she could better attend to her clients. This will be her third loan and she is happy to know that she will once again have the financial support to pursue her goals. She also promises to make her repayments on time as she has done with her earlier loans. She will use the $1,100 to buy more clothes in the city of Lima to improve her stock.

loans.use: to improve her sales stock.

loans.name: Mickmass

texts.en:
Mickmass is 25 years old and lives in the town of Nebbi in the Arua region of Uganda. He is single and has no children. Mickmass has had a clothes selling business for 7 years.         

To help expand his business, Mickmass has requested a loan of 2,500,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase clothes for resale. With the help of the loan from BRAC, Mickmass hopes to generate greater profits and to buy new clothes for himself. In the future, he hopes to expand his business. Mickmass is a member of BRAC’s small enterprise (SEP) program which has helped his prospects for the future by improving his business.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for resale.

loans.name: Rosline

texts.en:
Rosline is 43 years old and lives in the town of Nebbi in the Arua region of Uganda. She is married and has four children. All of her children are currently in school. Rosline has a business selling clothes, which she has had for eight years.         

To help expand her business, Rosline has requested a loan of 2,500,000 Ugandan shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase clothes for resale.  With the help of the loan from BRAC, Rosline hopes to generate greater profits and pay school fees for her children.  In the future, Rosline hopes to expand her business. Rosline is a member of BRAC’s small enterprise (SEP) program, which has helped her prospects for the future by improving her business.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for resale

loans.name: Abram

texts.en:
Abram is 45 years old and lives in the town of Arua in the Arua region of Uganda.  He is married and has four children.  All of his children are currently in school.  Abram has a small retail shop that sells sugar and soap, which he has had for seven years.         
	
To help expand his business, Abram has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan shillings from BRAC Uganda.  The loan will be used to purchase essential commodities like sugar, soap, and salt for resale. With the help of the loan from BRAC, Abram hopes to generate greater profits and pay school fees for his children. In the future, Abram hopes to expand his business.  Abram is a member of BRAC’s small enterprise (SEP) program, which has helped her prospects for the future by improving his business.

loans.use: to purchase essential commodities like sugar, soap, and salt for resale.

loans.name: Dorothy

texts.en:
Dorothy is 40 years old and lives in the town of Arua in the Arua region of Uganda. She is married and has 5 children. Four of her children are currently in school. Dorothy has had a health clinic for 6 years.         

To help expand her business, Dorothy has requested a loan of 2000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase drugs for her patients for resale. With the help of the loan, Dorothy hopes to generate greater profits and to pay school fees for her children. In the future, she hopes to expand her business. Dorothy is a member of BRAC’s small enterprise (SEP) program which has helped her prospects for the future by improving her business such that she has managed to pay for her children’s school fees.

loans.use: to purchase drugs for resale

loans.name: Safia

texts.en:
Safia is 48 years old and lives in the town of Arua hill in the Arua region of Uganda. She is single and has 7 children. Four of her children are currently in school. She has had a business selling small silver fish for over 10 years.         

To help expand her business, Safia has requested a loan of 2000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase silver fish for resale. With the help of the loan, she hopes to generate greater profits and to pay school fees for her children. In the future, Safia hopes to expand her business. Safia is a member of BRAC’s small enterprise (SEP) program which has helped her prospects for the future by improving her business such that she has managed to pay for her children’s school fees.

loans.use: to purchase silver fish for resale.

loans.name: Efrain

texts.es: Efraín, natural de la ciudad de San Francisco de 42 años de edad. Es un hombre humilde y trabajador, vive en una casa alquilada junto a su querida hija Karen de 05 años. Actualmente vive separado de su esposa y lo que más desea es poderle brindar un buen futuro a su querida hija.Efraín menciona que anteriormente trabajaba como empleado  de una empresa que se dedicaba a reparar todo tipo artefactos electrónicos. En la actualidad cuenta con propio taller donde repara todo tipo de artefactos, su especialidad es refaccionar artefactos de refrigeración, ya que así sea una refrigeradora, congeladora o una cámara frigorífica, él con mucha astucia y la experiencia adquirida por los transcursos  de los años, las deja como nuevas. Efraín menciona que en su taller dispone con el apoyo de un amigo quien se encarga de desmantelar los artefactos para luego poder repararlo y dejarlo como nueva. Lleva 27 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es conseguir los repuesto que necesitan cada artefacto y con el dinero del crédito comprará válvulas, pernos y braguetas para poder reparar. Efraín aspira en un futuro promisorio desea ampliar su taller, para así poder atender a más clientes a la vez.Este será su octavo préstamo con MFP y espera una vez más ser apoyado con el financiamiento para seguir avanzando y creciendo económicamente, además esta fortalecido con su banco comunal, ya que todos los socios están comprometidos a crecer.Con el dinero del crédito comprará repuestos para reparar las distintas marcas de cada artefacto.
texts.en: Efraín, a native of the city of San Francisco, is 42 years old. He is a humble and hardworking man and lives in a rented house along with his beloved daughter, 5 year old Karen. He is currently separated from his wife, and what he most wants is to be able to offer a good future to his dear daughter. Efraín mentioned that he used to work as an employee in a firm that repaired all sorts of electronic goods. Now he has his own workshop where he repairs all sorts of appliances, and his speciality is fixing chilling appliances such as fridges, freezers, and cold stores. Using the knowledge and experience he has gained over the course of years, he leaves them as good as new. Efraín mentioned that he is helped in his workshop by a friend who is in charge of dismantling the appliances so that he can repair them and leave them good as new. He has been doing this for 27 years and thinks that the most difficult thing is getting the parts that each appliance requires and he will use the credit to buy valves and bolts for making repairs. Efraín hopes that in the future he can expand his workshop so that he can serve more clients at a time. This will be his 8th loan from MFP and he hopes that he will once again have the financial support to keep advancing and growing economically. He is also strengthened by his community bank as all the members are seeking to grow their businesses. He will use the loan money to buy parts to repair different brands of each appliance.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to repair the different brands of each appliance.

loans.name: Manana

texts.en:
Manana is a farmer from the village Sartichala, East Georgia. She is 38 years old, married and lives with her husband, Koba, and 15-year-old daughter. Manana is leading the dairy farm owned by the family. They have 2 milk cows. Manana produces and sells 40-50kg of cheese per month. Koba owns a truck. He brings svia from Rustavi (nearby town) and sells it in the village. 

At the moment the truck is out of order and Manana has requested credit to repair it. After repairing the truck Koba will re-start selling keri and the family will again get their normal income which equals 800 Laris per month.

loans.use: to pay for repairing the truck

loans.name: Leoncia

texts.es: Leoncia, natural D. la ciudad D. San Francisco D. 66 años, es una mujer que siempre a trabajado muy duro por sobre salir en la vida, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Fortunato D. 67 años y lo que más desea es vivir una vejez muy tranquila.La actividad a la que se dedica Leoncia, es la venta D. ropa, en su puesto ubicado en el mercado “Gamarrita D. la ciudad D. San Francisco del departamento D. Ayacucho - Perú”, ella  todos los días atienD. a muchos compradores, quienes sabiendo D. la buena calidad y lo novedoso D. las prendas que ella misma trae desD. la ciudad D. Lima, no dudan en comprarle en grandes cantidades.Lo que más le gusta D. su trabajo es distraerse con cada uno D. sus clientes a la vez aprovecha en aconsejar a sus compradores sobre las prendas que mejor las quedan, ya que así se gana la  confianza D. cada uno D. ellos, lleva 45 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer largas horas en espera D. clientes. Leoncia agradece al apoyo solidario D. los financistas ya que gracias al apoyo D. ellos va progresando y obteniendo buenas comodidades. En adelante espera contar con la misma fuerza para los años posteriores  ya que su negocio es su único sustento.Este será su crédito número 06 con MFP y por ello espera D. su colaboración para poder comprar la mercadería a la vez se compromete pagar puntualmente sus cronogramas D. pago ya que desea acceder a otros préstamos posteriormente.Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más ropa D. la ciudad D. Lima, para implementar mejor su puesto D. ventas.
texts.en: Leonica, a native of the city of San Francisco, is a 66 year old woman who has always worked very hard to get on in life. She lives in her own house with her 67 year old husband, Fortunado. What she most want is to live a peaceful old age. The business she works in is selling clothes and she has a stall in the "Gamarrita" market in the city of San Francisco in the department of Ayacucho-Peru. Every day she serves many customers who know that the clothes she brings from Lima are good quality and in fashion so they don't hesitate to buy in large quantities. What she most likes about her work is distracting herself with each of her customers and taking the opportunity to advise them about the clothes that will best suit them. In this way, she gains the confidence of each customer. She has been doing this work for 45 years and thinks that the most difficult thing is that she has to work long hours waiting on customers. Leoncia is grateful for the support of the financiers as, thanks to their support, she is progressing and is able to afford some comforts. In the future, she hopes to have the same strength she has had in previous years as her business is her only financial support. This will be her 6th loan from MFP and she hopes this collaboration will enable her to buy the merchandise and at the same time she promises to make her repayments on time as she wants to be able to access more loans later. She will use the $375 she is requesting to buy more clothes in the city of Lima to better stock her business.

loans.use: to buy more clothes from the city of Lima, to better supply her business.

loans.name: Gaby

texts.es: Gaby tiene 22 años, vive con sus padres en casa de ellos, que se encuentra ubicada en la ciudad de Orcotuna. Tiene un año de experiencia vendiendo bisuterías y cosméticos, productos que los ofrece en su tienda. Decidió emprender este negocio con el propósito de tener su propio ingreso económico y ser ella quien lo administra, asimismo le da la facilidad de disponer de su horario. Ella es una mujer que se destaca en la perseverancia y eso lo ha demostrado a lo largo de tiempo de trabajo que tiene y  ahora está dando sus frutos al ver que su capital crece. Sus planes es seguir creciendo e incrementando sus ganancias y tener mayor variedad de productos al vender. Una de sus vecinas le recomendó  trabajar con créditos y con garantía a través de MFP porque ve que las cuotas pueden ser accesibles de acuerdo a las ganancias que recibe de  su negocio por lo que se compromete en ser puntual en sus pagos. El dinero que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de más mercadería, como cosméticos y prendas íntimas, eso significaría para su negocio un aumento de capital.
texts.en: Gaby, 22, lives with her parents in the city of Orcotuna.  She has operated a business selling jewelry and cosmetics for a year.  She sells the products in her own store.  She decided to start the business because she needed an income of her own, one that she would control and be responsible for.  She also wanted to be able to set her own hours.  She is notably persistent, a trait evident from the years she has worked already, work that she can now see bearing fruit as the value of her business grows.  She plans to continue growing the business and the revenues it generates by adding to the variety of products she sells.  A neighbor recommended that she borrow what she needs to expand the business and she saw that--with an MFP loan--she could repay the loan with part of the extra income she will earn.  Gaby is committed to repaying the loan in the agreed-upon time.  She will use the loan to buy merchandise--cosmetics and lingerie, for example--that she will resell.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her cosmetics sales business.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy tiene 25 años, vive en casa de sus padres en compañía de su esposo y su pequeña hija. Desde su niñez ha aprendió a desarrollar bellos tejidos hechos a mano y en la actualidad es una fuente de ingreso muy importante para la economía de su hogar. Trabaja todos los días en la comodidad de su hogar, de esa manera no descuida de su hija, y sin preocupación puede elaborar variedad de prendas tejidas. Pero hay momentos en que debe realizar decenas de prendas, es por ello que contrata la mano de obra de varias mujeres a quienes les da una remuneración por su trabajo.  Ella procura siempre abastecerse de materiales como hilos, lanas de diversos colores, y acompañado de la creatividad que tiene instrumentos suficientes para poder mantenerse y superar sus metas propuestas. Ahora se encuentra en temporada de mayor demanda y por ello necesita un crecimiento de capital, por lo que espera le concedan un pequeño préstamo. Una de sus vecinas le platicó acerca de los créditos que ofrece MFP y decidió solicitar un crédito. Las cuales usará el dinero en la compra de  lanas de distintas calidades y colores, de esa manera podrá ofrecer mayor variedad de precios a sus clientes.
texts.en: Nancy, 25, her husband and young daughter live with her parents.  She learned to make beautiful hand-made textiles as a girl and now she operates a business making and selling them, an important source of income for her family.  She works in the comfort of her own house, an advantage because she can look after her daughter while she works.  There are times when she has to make dozens of pieces and there's so much work that she has to hire extra help.  She always stocks up on the supplies--thread, for example, and various colors of yarn--she needs for the business.  Her materials and her creativity are all she needs to support herself and reach her goals.  She's especially busy this time of year and she wants to increase her working capital.  A neighbor suggested that she apply to MFP for a loan and she decided to do it.  She will use the loan to buy wool of various quality and colors so that she can offer her customers products at various price levels.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her textile business.

loans.name: Delia

texts.es: Delia a sus 41 años sigue trabajando de manera dura. Ella comparte su vida a lado de sus 5 hijos.
