Desde su niñez aprendió a tejer diversos puntos a mano, actividad que se ha convertido en su principal fuente de ingresos. Por otro lado también se dedica al bordado, por lo que elabora dos chompas por semana. Sin embargo, la cantidad de pedidos que tiene son de comerciantes mayoristas, por ello necesita producir más de lo que normalmente elabora. Ante esto debe contratar 4 señoras, quienes la ayudaran a terminar la cantidad de prendas de necesita. Por otro lado posee una tienda de abarrotes, en donde también ofrece el servicio de llamadas locales e internacionales. Delia disfruta de lo que hace porque le agrada y porque además es una actividad rentable. Su deseo es producir más chompas pero para ello requiere un crecimiento de capital para comprar más  cantidad de lana. En su quinta solicitud de crédito que tiene con MFP, tiene una grata experiencia de trabajo con su banco comunal porque cada uno de sus integrantes son personas responsables en sus pagos que han demostrado ser confiables y por esta razón seguirá solicitando créditos para el crecimiento de su negocio. En esta ocasión el dinero lo invertirá en la compra de más materiales para estar  bien abastecida, como lana e hilos de diversos colores y calidades.
texts.en: Delia, 41, is still working hard.  She shares her life with her 5 children.  She learned to knit when she was just a girl and she now operates a business making and selling knitted pieces, a business that's become her main source of income.  She also does embroidery work, embroidering and selling two sweaters per week.  The orders she has now are from retailers so she needs to produce more than she normally does.  She has to hire 4 women who will help her finish the extra pieces.  Delia also operates a grocery business where, among other things, she sells local and international phone services.  She likes the businesses because the work is pleasant and they generate a good income.  Her goal is to make more sweaters but she needs more working capital for the extra wool she needs.  This is her fifth MFP loan.  She likes her community bank because all of the members have confidence in her and, as a consequence, she can continue to borrow the money she needs to expand her business.  She will use this loan to buy materials--wool and threads of various quality and colors--to stock her business.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her sewing business.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 43 años, es una mujer alegre y trabajadora, vive en una casa alquilada junto a su esposo Eugenio de 50 años y su querida hija Stefanny de 13 años, a quien desea brindarle una mejor calidad de vida.Maria, mujer de arduas labores que cumplir, por ello se despierta muy temprano para preparar los alimentos para los miembros de su familia para luego dirigirse a abrir las puertas de su negocio en espera de sus primeros consumidores, La tienda de abarrotes de Sabina es una de las más visitadas de su centro poblado por el gran carisma que posee y la amabilidad en su trato, han hecho que sea la preferida por sus vecinos, quienes no dudan en hacer sus compras sabiendo de la gran variedad de productos de primera necesidad lo encontraran en la tienda de Sabina. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es dialogar con sus clientes, lleva 12 años en esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer de pie todo el transcurso del día. Con el apoyo del crédito solicitado comprará más provisiones para su tienda.Más adelante, espera que su negocio crezca y se convierta en la más preferida y concurrida de su comunidad.Este será su quinto crédito y necesita el apoyo de los financistas para llevar consigo  su propósito, además se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas puntualmente y agradece por ser parte de su banco comunal.Con el monto solicitado, comprará mas mercaderías como sacos de arroz, azúcar, leche, fideos, conservas y entre otros productos.
texts.en:
Maria, 43, is a happy and hardworking woman. She lives in a rented house together with her husband, Eugenio, 50, and her beloved daughter, Stefanny, 13, for whom she wants to provide a better quality of life. Maria, a woman who has many tasks to perform, wakes up very early in the morning to prepare food for her family before going to open her business and await her first customers. The Sabina grocery story is one of the most frequented in the town center due to Maria’s great charisma and her courteous treatment of customers. These have made her store a favorite in the neighborhood, whose occupants do not hesitate to make purchases there, knowing of the great variety of essential goods they will find.

What Maria likes best about her work is the opportunity to talk to her customers. She has been in this business for 12 years and considers the most difficult aspect having to remain on her feet all day. This loan will enable her to buy more supplies for her store. In the future she hopes that her business will grow and that it will become the busiest and most popular store in the wider community. This will be her fifth loan and she needs the funding to help her fulfill her goal. In addition, she is committed to making her payments on time and is grateful that she is a member of her communal bank. She will buy more merchandise with the loan such as sacks of flour, sugar, milk, noodles and canned food among other supplies.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise such as sacks of rice, sugar, milk, noodles and canned goods among other supplies.

loans.name: Eric

texts.es: Eric tiene 29 años, vive al lado de su esposa y su hija en una casa alquilada. Vende de manera independiente productos de salud que son naturales y de marcas reconocidas en su medio. Es así que ofrece sus productos, orientados en la prevención de enfermedades. Ella reconoce que debe captar clientes fijos para asegurar sus ventas futuras, por ello se esmera en conocer las propiedades de los productos que vende, para aconsejar a sus compradores. Se siente muy motivado de realizar este negocio, porque percibe buenas ganancias, eso le ayuda a crecer como persona. Su mayor ambición es tener una gran distribuidora de productos naturales. Es su tercera vez que esta solicitando un crédito con MFP y ha podido ver las ventajas de trabajar con prestamos para crecer en su capital de trabajo de las cuales  esta muy agradecido y en esta oportunidad seguirá trabajando para mejorar su negocio. Con el dinero que solicita, comprará productos naturales medicinales.
texts.en:
Eric is 29 years old and he lives with his wife and daughter in a rented house. He sells health products independently that are natural and recognized brands in their environment. He offers products aimed at disease prevention.  Eric recognizes that he must get regular customers to secure future sales, so he strives to know the properties of the products he sells, in order to advise buyers. 

Eric feels very motivated to do this business because he sees good earnings, and that helps him grow as a person. His greatest ambition is to have a large distributor of natural products. It is his third time applying for a loan with MFP and he has seen the benefits of working with loans to grow his working capital.  He is very grateful and will continue to work to improve his business. With the money that he requested, he will buy natural medicinal products.

loans.use: to buy natural products.

loans.name: Maximo

texts.es:
Máximo, de 62 años, es un hombre alegre, cortés y trabajador. Vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Felicita de 66 años y sus 02 hijos menores, a quienes les brinda una educación justa y adecuada.
Todos los días Máximo abre desde las 06 de la mañana su tienda y comienza a vender sus deliciosas golosinas, su negocio es muy concurrido en la ciudad de San Francisco, ya que es un vendedor muy persuasivo y siempre convence a sus clientes de comprar más de lo que tenían que comprar.Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes, sobre las cosas que suceden en la ciudad, así aprovecha para distraerse un poco, lleva 06 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer todo el día en su tienda en espera de clientes.  Máximo con el préstamo solicitado podrá comprar maquinas especiales para preparar los refrescos que calmen la sed de sus consumidores. Para mejorar sus ingresos espera montar otro tipo de negocio una tienda de pastiquerias donde pueda brindar a sus clientes variedad de productos.Este será su quinto crédito y por ello se siente muy contento de saber que contara una vez mas con el apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá seguro de seguir prosperando y esta dispuesto a devolver puntualmente sus aportes programados.Con el monto solicitado adquirirá una maquina especial donde pueda preparar sus refrescos.
texts.en:
Máximo, 62, is a happy, courteous and hardworking man. He lives in his own house with his wife Felicita, 66, and his two young sons, who he provides with a decent education.

Every day, Máximo opens his shop at 6am and begins selling his delicious sweets. His business is very popular in the city of San Francisco, as he is a very persuasive seller and he always convinces his customers to buy more than they need. What he most likes about his work is talking to his customers about all the goings on in the city, which gives him the chance to amuse himself a bit. He has been doing this work for 6 years and he says that the most difficult thing is having to spend all day in his shop waiting for customers.

With this loan, Máximo will be able to buy special machines to prepare soft drinks to quench the thirst of his customers. In order to increase his earnings, he hopes to start up another kind of business - a plastics shop - where he can provide his customers with a variety of products. This will be his fifth loan and he is very happy to know that he can count on financial support, as he feels certain his business will continue to prosper and he is determined to make his repayments on time. With the amount requested, he will acquire a special machines for preparing soft drinks.

loans.use: to acquire a special machine for preparing soft drinks.

loans.name: Benedicto

texts.es: Benedicto, de 41 años, vive en su casa propia junto a su hijo Elio de 12 años, al que educa y cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Cumutay. Valiente padre soltero, así definimos a Benedicto, quien se dedica a las labores agrícolas desde muy joven y con el transcurrir de los años aprendió todas las técnicas necesarias para obtener una buena producción, es por eso que en la actualidad siembra alverjas y papa. Lo que más le gusta es cuidar con esmero sus cultivos, y luego de un tiempo recoge toda su producción de calidad, y la traslada hasta el mercado mayorista de su ciudad. Lo que no le gusta es que muchas veces trabaja solo, porque su hijo estudia, pero le ayuda en lo que puede. Como es un hombre emprendedor tiene grandes planes para el futuro, y uno de ellos es sembrar en mayor cantidad para mejorar sus ganancias, sabe que lo logrará, ya que comenzó con el negocio de compra y venta de papa, donde está obteniendo buenas ganancias que le permitirán invertir más en sus cultivos. Es el sexto crédito con MFP, y esta muy agradecido con todas las personas que hicieron posible el crédito y también está muy satisfecho con el desempeño de su grupo, pues esta integrado por personas responsables y solidarias. Benedicto de obtener su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de semilla de alverja y fertilizantes naturales, pues necesita mejorar su producción para la siguiente campaña.
texts.en:
Benedicto, 41, lives in his own house with his son Elio,12, whom he educates and takes care of at home in the hamlet of Cumutay. 'Brave single parent', is how we define Benedicto, who has been working in farming since a young age.  Through the passing of the years he learned all the techniques needed for good production.  That is why now he is planting peas and potatoes. What he likes most is to carefully take care of his crops, and after some time to gather all the quality production, and bring it to the wholesale market of his city. What he does not enjoy is that he often works alone, because his son is in school, but he helps as he can.

As an entrepreneur, Benedicto has big plans for the future, and one of them is to plant more to improve his profits.  He knows that he will succeed.  He already began the business of buying and selling potatoes, which are producing good profits that allow him to invest more in his crops. This is his sixth loan with MFP, and he is very grateful to everyone who made the loan.  He is also very satisfied with the performance of his group, which is composed of responsible and caring people. With your support, Benedicto will invest the requested loan to buy bags of pea seeds and natural fertilizers, as he needs to improve his production next season.

loans.use: to buy pea seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Orencia

texts.es: Orencia, de 47 años, es una mujer trabajadora y alegre. Su familia lo conforma su esposo Roberto y sus 3 hijos, a los que ama mucho; juntos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). Como esposos, amigos y socios, Orencia, puso una tienda de comestibles, donde todas las mañanas, vende productos de primera necesidad, mientras que su esposo “Lolo”, así lo llama de cariño, trabaja en sus terrenos agrícolas, desde hace 31 años. Sus principales cultivos constan de café y palta. Lo que más le gusta a ella, es poder compartir los gastos familiares entre los dos, pues así logran desarrollarse juntos. Los planes de está pareja es poder obtener un buen grano de café, por ello están trabajando arduamente para la próxima campaña agrícola, donde comercializan sus granos a la cooperativa de Alto Palomar, obteniendo ganancias de acuerdo a la calidad del café. Según cuenta, este año el precio de venta del grano, aumentó considerablemente y espera aprovechar la demanda surgida. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Prestatarios de la unión palomar”, y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde desea salir adelante en compañía de su asociación; asimismo agradece el apoyo recibido por todos ustedes. Orencia de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales, que esparcirá en sus plantaciones de café.
texts.en:
Orencia, 47, is a working woman and cheerful person. Her family is composed of her husband Roberto and their 3 children, whom she loves very much.  They live together in their own home, located in Unión Palomar (central Peruvian jungle). Orencia and her husband work as spouses, friends and associates.  Orencia installed a grocery store, where every morning she sells staples, while her husband "Lolo", whom she calls with affection, works on his agricultural land, as he has been for 31 years. His main crops consist of coffee and avocado. 

What Orencia likes most is to to be able to share family expenses between the two of them, as well as to develop together. The couple's plans are to get a good coffee bean, so they are working hard for the next crop year where they market their grain to the cooperative Alto Palomar, a profit based on the quality of coffee. Orencia says, this year the selling price of grain increased considerably and she hopes to take advantage of the arising demand. She belongs to the communal bank "Prestatarios de la unión palomar," and this is her second loan with MFP.  She wants to get ahead in its association and also appreciates the support received from all of you. Upon receving your support, Orencia will invest the requested loan to buy bags of natural fertilizers, that she will spread over their coffee plantations.

loans.use: to buy bags of natural fertilizer.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es: Gladys, de 51 años, está casada con Aurelio. Ambos tienen una hija, Magaly de 17 años de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). La zona alta de Unión, es propicia para brindar granos de buena calidad, sus tierras fértiles son adecuadas y buenas para brindar el grano de café con buen aroma. Es por ello que todos los fines de semana en compañía de su esposo cuidan de sus cultivos de café, ya tiene 16 años dedicándose a ello y según menciona sus granos son muy reconocidos en la cooperativa de Alto Palomar, donde vende en cada campaña agrícola. Cuenta que constantemente realiza viveros de café, con los cuales renuevan sus plantaciones antiguas, ahora tienen 3 mil plantitas en proceso de germinación; con ello esperan tener nuevos y mejores granos. Además menciona que su esposo trabaja en una panadería. Todas las mañanas de lunes a viernes desde muy temprano él, se dirige a una fuente de soda donde trabaja, ahí elabora los ricos panes y pasteles que deleitan todas las mañanas a los pobladores de su localidad. Donde obtiene un dinero extra; es así que esperan juntar lo necesario para comprar más terrenos agrícolas. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Prestatarios de la unión palomar” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera salir adelante con el apoyo de su banco comunal, los que trabajaran arduamente para salir adelante. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Gladys de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la contrata de peones para que le ayuden en la limpieza, poda y macheteo de sus plantaciones de café. Asimismo comprará varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales para sus viveros.
texts.en: Gladys is 51 years old and is married to Aurelio. They have a daughter, Magaly, who is 17 years old. They live together in a house of their own, located in Unión Palomar (Peru's central rainforest). The upper region of Unión is good for growing high-quality grains; its fertile land is well-suited for coffee beans with a good aroma. That is why every weekend she and her husband care for their coffee crops. They have done it for 16 years, and their beans are very well-recognized at the Alto Palomar cooperative, where she sells in every agricultural season. She says that she continually maintains coffee nurseries, with which they renew their old plantations. They now have three thousand plantlings in germination; with these they hope to have new and better beans. She also says that her husband works in a bakery. Every morning, Monday to Friday, he goes very early to a shop where he works; there he makes the rich bread and pastry that delight the residents of their town every morning. This is where he makes extra money, which is how they hope to gather what they need to buy more agricultural land. She belongs to the community bank "Prestatarios de la unión palomar" ("Unión Palomar Borrowers"), and this is her first loan with MFP. She hopes to get ahead with the support of her community bank, those who will work hard to get ahead. She also promises to make her repayments promptly. Gladys, upon receiving your support, will use the loan to hire workers to help her with cleaning, pruning, and cutting on her coffee plantations. She will also buy several bags of natural fertilizers for her nurseries.

loans.use: hire workers and buy natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Milka

texts.es: Milka, de 21 años, es una luchadora madre soltera. Ella vive con su hija, en casa de sus padres, ubicada en la comunidad de Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). Como mujer y madre, joven, ella tiene muchas ambiciones. Hace 2 años su padre le heredó un terreno agrícola, con el que comenzó a sembrar café, ahora ella tiene unos cafetales jóvenes, que le proporcionan buenos granos. Aprovechando esa ventaja, manda a procesar el grano, vendiendo el café natural en grandes cantidades, a las diferentes tiendas de la ciudad de La Merced, donde tiene clientes fijos. Lo que más le gusta a ella, es poder ser independiente y tener oportunidad de crecer, pues a pesar de sus limitaciones y responsabilidades, ella no se amilana, por el contrario; tiene deseos de estudiar, y poder tener una empresa exportadora de café. Sabe que el camino es largo, pero está dispuesta a pasarlo y salir exitosa para brindarle a su hija un futuro diferente. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Prestatarios de la unión palomar”, y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde encontró el apoyo que tanto necesitaba. Razón por la que promete ser puntual con sus cuotas. Milka de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales, para continuar con el mejoramiento de sus plantaciones de café.
texts.en:
Milka, 21, is a struggling single mother. She lives with her daughter in her parents' home, located in the community of Unión Palomar (central Peruvian jungle). As a young woman and mother, she has many ambitions.  Two years ago she inherited her father's agricultural land, with which she began to grow coffee.  She now has several young coffee plantations, which provide good kernels. Leveraging this advantage, she is processing the grain and selling natural coffee in large quantities to the various shops in the city of La Merced, where she has regular customers. 

What Milka likes most is to be independent and have a chance to grow.  In spite of her limitations and responsibilities, she is undaunted, however, she has a desire to study and to have a coffee exporting company. She knows that the road is long, but she is ready to pass through successfully and give her daughter a different future. Milka belongs to the communal bank "Prestatarios de la unión palomar," and this is her second loan with MFP, where she found the support she needed.  This is the reason why she promises to be punctual in her payments. Upon receiving your support, Milka will invest the requested loan to buy bags of natural fertilizers to continue improving her coffee plantations.

loans.use: to buy several bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, de 41 años es una mujer emprendedora y con ganas de superarse, esta casada y vive en  casa propia junto a sus tres hijos y su esposo con quien comparte la educación y alimentación de sus hijos.El trabajo de Rosa consiste en salir a la casa de sus amigas en busca de pedidos para poder realizar através de los catálogos que tiene de perfumes, ropas, joyas, etc. Ella también realiza esta actividad en su casa en donde armo un pequeño stand donde coloca todos los productos que tiene, tiene la ayuda de su hija quien coloca alguno de sus productos entre sus amistades también, lleva ya 3 años trabajando en esto y le va muy bien.Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que aporta en la economía de su hogar, espera poner mas adelante una pequeña pero muy surtida boutique en su casa donde pueda exhibir todos los productos que vende. Este es el tercer préstamo entre Rosa y la institución MFP, le grada mucho el grupo que conforma, además espera poder cumplir como lo ha hecho hasta ahora, tiene muchas expectativas para mas adelante y espera mantener su historial crediticio con la institución impecable para que pueda seguir trabajando como lo ha hecho hasta ahora.Con el monto solicitado 1800 soles, comprará productos por catalogo que están en promoción, para tenerlos en stock y así poder maximizar su ganancia.
texts.en: Rosa, 41 years old, is an ambitious woman who wants to excel. She is married in lives in her own home with her three children and her husband, who shares in feeding and educating their children. Rosa's work consists of going to her friends' houses to get orders for items from catalogs that carry perfume, clothing, jewelry, etc. She also does this at home, where she put together a small stand that holds all of the products she has. She has the help of her daughter, who sells some of her products to her friends as well. She has been working at this for three years, and it is going very well. What she likes about her work is that it contributes to the household income. She hopes to eventually have a small but very well-stocked boutique in her house where she can display all of the products she sells. This is Rosa's third loan from MFP. She is very thankful for the group she is part of, and she also hopes to be able to repay her loan as she has up to now. She has many expectations for the future and hopes to maintain her impeccable credit history with the institution so she can continue working as she has done up to now. With the requested loan of 1,800 soles, she will buy catalog products that are on sale, to have them in stock and thus be able to maximize her profits.

loans.use: buy catalog products that are on sale, to have them in stock and thus maximize her profits.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 56 años, es una mujer trabajadora y responsable. A pesar de la separación que tiene con su esposo, ella sigue trabajando en conjunto para poder cuidar de sus 2 hijas; con quienes viven en la comunidad de Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). El trabajo al que se dedica es “la agricultura”, ya tiene 33 años dedicándose al cultivo de la tierra. Lo que más le gusta a ella es la dedicación que le brindan sus hijas a sus terrenos agrícolas, ya que la ayudan a cuidar, limpiar y abonar sus sembríos; que constan en su mayoría de café, el cual después de su cosecha lo comercializa en la Cooperativa de Alto Palomar. Pero lo que le genera ganancias diarias pero menos rentables; son sus cultivos de plátanos y palta, los que cada 15 días los comercializa en Punte Paucartambo, que es un anexo para la comercialización entre las ciudades de Villa Rica y Oxapampa. Por el futuro de sus hijas, está planeando mejorar sus cultivos de café, para que pueda tener mayores ganancias, ya que el precio de venta subió en este año. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Prestatarios de la unión palomar” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP; donde espera del apoyo financiero de todos ustedes; además promete trabajar por el desarrollo de su asociación y pagar sus cuotas puntualmente. María de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales para esparcirlos en sus cafetales, asimismo piensa comprar 3 mil mamones (plantitas de plátanos) para renovar sus platanales, donde también esparcirá fertilizantes después de un mes de sembrío.
texts.en:
María, 56, is a responsible, hardworking woman. Despite separating from her husband, she continues to work in order to take care of her two daughters with whom she lives in the community of Unión Palomar (in the middle of the Peruvian forest). She is an agriculturalist and has spent 33 years cultivating the land. What pleases her most is how dedicated her daughters are to her plots of land since they help her tend, clean and fertilize her fields, which are planted primarily in coffee. After the harvest, she sells her crop in the Alto Palomar Cooperative. But what generates her daily but less profitable earnings are her banana and avocado crops, which she markets every 15 days in Punte Paucartambo, a marketing annex between the cities of Villa Rica and Oxapampa. To insure her daughters’ future, she is planning to improve her coffee cultivation to increase her income since the price of coffee went up this year.  

María belongs to the “Prestatarios de la unión palomar” communal bank and this will be her second loan from MFP. She hopes to obtain financial support from all of you. In addition, she promises to work for the development of her communal bank and to make her payments on time. Upon receiving your support, she will invest her loan in the purchase of several sacks of natural fertilizers to apply to her coffee plants. She also intends to buy 3 thousand new banana plants to renew her banana plantation, where she will also spread fertilizer one month after planting.

loans.use: to buy 3 thousand banana plants and several sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Dina

texts.es: Dina, de 24 años, es una mujer luchadora. Su familia lo conforman, su esposo Denis y sus 3 hijos, a quienes ama. Juntos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en comunidad de Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). En todo este tiempo de casada, ella se dedicó a varias actividades, hace poco cerró su negocio de carpintería por problemas económico. Pero con el esfuerzo conjunto de su familia, está segura que muy pronto abrirán. Ahora ella se dedica al negocio de embolsado de plantitas de café, con el que se realiza germinados en los viveros para el trasplantado de los cafetales malogrados, logrando vender en sus mejores días, mil plantitas de café. Asimismo su esposo Denis, se dedica a la agricultura junto con ella, hace ya 8 años; sus principales sembríos constan de café, plátanos y palta; vendiendo el grano de café en la ciudad de Villa Rica. Según cuenta este año, obtuvo buenas ganancias en la comercialización de los granos, pues el incremento del precio de venta en el mercado es muy bueno; por eso está trabajando duro para aprovechar la subida. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Prestatarios de unión palomar” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde asegura podrá salir adelante con el trabajo duro y el apoyo financiero de todos ustedes. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Dina de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales, semilla de café y bolsas para comenzar con el germinado de café, que muy pronto realizará.
texts.en: Dina, 24, is a fighting woman.  Her family consists of her husband, Denis, and their 3 children, whom they adore.  They live in their own house in the Unión Palomar community (central Peruvian jungle).  Since she’s been married she has done several types of jobs.  A little while ago she  closed the carpentry business because of money problems.  But with family effort, she is sure that soon it will reopen.  Now she sells  coffee plants that she grows in the greenhouses to transplant in the coffee fields.   She is able to sell, on her best days, 1000 coffee seedlings.  Her husband, Denis, has also farmed with her for the past 8 years.  Their main crops are coffee, bananas, and avodados, selling  the coffee beans in Villa Rica.  As she tells us, this year she had the best income from the coffee bean sales because the increase in price in the market is very good.  That’s why she is working hard to take advantage of the increase.  She belongs to the communal bank “Prestatarios de Unión Palomar  and this is her second loan with MFP.  She is sure that she will get ahead with hard work and the financial support of all of you.  She also promises to be punctual with her payments.  She will use the money requested to buy natural fertilizers, coffee seeds and sacks to begin growing the coffee that she will soon start.

loans.use: To buy coffee beans, fertiizer and bags.

loans.name: Meri

texts.es: Meri, de 47 años, es una luchadora madre soltera que vive en compañía de su hija Jocelyn de 18 años, con quien vive en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad de la Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). El trabajo al que se dedica está laboriosa mujer, es la agricultura. Sus principales cultivos constan de café y plátanos. “Las mejores ganancias depende del tiempo de cosecha, si recoges el grano en el tiempo exacto, el aroma es mejor”, afirma. Ya que en el primer mes comienza la “rebusca” (proceso de selección de los granos que comienzan a madurar), en el segundo mes es la “plena” (donde todos los granos están en colmada maduración). Sus 10 años de experiencia, le ayudan a obtener buenas cosechas, por ello los mismos comerciantes de café, llegan a sus propios terrenos a comprar su cosecha entera. Ella desea seguir sembrando, y produciendo café del bueno. Este año le fue muy bien y espera conseguir el mismo resultado con sus plantaciones de plátanos. Además comenzó con la venta de productos de belleza a base de plantas naturales; donde obtiene un dinero extra y así poder mantener su economía estable. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Prestatarios de unión palomar” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde está segura de salir adelante con el apoyo de su banco comunal y de todo ustedes. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Meri de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 800 mamones (plantitas de plátanos) para comenzar con la renovación de plantaciones viejas; para ello también comprará varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales.
texts.en:
Meri, 47, is a determined single mother who lives with her 18-year-old daughter, Jocelyn. They live in their own house in the Unión Palomar community (in Peru's central jungle).

This hardworking woman is a farmer. Her main crops are coffee and plantains. "The best earnings depend on harvest time; if you collect the coffee beans at the right time, the aroma is better," she says. In the first month she begins the “rebusca” (the process of selecting the beans that are beginning to ripen), and the "plena" (when the beans reach their peak ripeness) is in the second month Her ten years of experience help her to get good harvests, and this is why the coffee merchants themselves come to her lands to buy her entire harvest.

She wants to continue sowing and producing good coffee. This was a very good year for Meri, and she hopes to have the same result with her plantain crop. She also began selling beauty products made from natural plant sources, so she earns some extra money and can keep her finances stable.

Meri belongs to the “Prestatarios de Unión Palomar” (Unión Palomar Borrowers) communal bank, and this is her second loan with MFP. She is sure she will move forward with the help of her communal bank and all of you. She also promises to make her payments on time.

Meri is grateful for your support. She will use the money she has asked for to buy 800 plantain plants so she can begin renewing old plantings; to do this she will also buy several sacks of natural fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy 800 plantain plants and sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Cliber

texts.es: Cliber, de 39 años, es un hombre soltero y trabajador que vive en compañía de su mamá Clara y su padre Magno; a quien protege y cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). Como técnico Agropecuario, él tiene muchos proyectos, su mayor deseo es mejorar la calidad de sus cultivos, con miras a la exportación, pues su especialidad son proyectos productivos. Eso lo demuestra en sus cultivos de café, donde aplica todos sus conocimientos. Cuenta que, para renovar y mejorar sus plantaciones, necesita un promedio de 8 mil nuevos soles. A él le falta poco para conseguir granos parejos y de buena calidad. Por ello en cada cosecha vende su grano a la cooperativa de Alto Palomar, donde es asociado y está en busca del mejor grano. Asimismo siembra plátanos como un producto alternativo, asegurando así su economía; cada 15 días recoge los frutos maduros para comercializarlos. Ya tiene 20 años dedicándose a esto, pero según menciona antes no tenia el conocimiento que ahora posee, por ello está seguro que logrará su objetivo, como también; el de comprar más terrenos cultivables. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Prestatarios de la unión palomar” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para lograr sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con las cuotas. Cliber de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales, para distribuirlos en sus cultivos y viveros de café que piensa realizar dentro de algunos meses.
texts.en: Cliber is 39 years old. He is a single, hardworking man who lives with his mother Clara and father Magno. He protects and takes care of them in his own house located in the community of Unión Palomar (central Peruvian jungle). As a farmer, he has a lot of projects. His greatest wish is to improve the quality of his crops with plans for exportation. His specialty is productive projects. He demonstrates this with his coffee crops, where he applies all of his knowledge. He relates that, in order to renew and improve his plantings, he needs an average of 8 thousand nuevos soles. He needs a little more to have even, good quality beans. That is why at every harvest he sells his beans to the cooperative of Alto Palomar where he is a member. He is looking for a better bean. In addition, he is planting plantains as an alternative crop, to ensure his income. Every two weeks he picks the ripe fruit to sell it. He has been doing this for 20 years, but states that before he didn't have the knowledge that he has now. That is why he is sure that he will attain his goal, buying more arable land. He belongs to the “Prestatarios de la Unión Palomar” [Borrowers of Union Palomar] community bank and this is his second loan with MFP. He hopes to have all of your support to attain his goals. He also promises to make his payments on time. If Cliber receives your support, he will invest the money he has asked for in buying various sacks of natural fertilizer to spread on his crops and coffee fields, which he plans on doing in a few months.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Bernandina

texts.es: Bernardina, es una mujer alegre, de 37 años. Su familia lo integra su esposo Emerson, y sus 5 hijos todos ellos menores de edad; en armonía familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). Sabe que el camino  para el progreso es largo, más aún cuando tiene hijos por mantener y educar. Pero esto no la desanima, ya que es una mujer laboriosa y trabajadora. La agricultura es su principal actividad económica. Sus cultivos constan de café, plátanos y palta, ya tiene 13 años dedicándose a ello, y lo que más le gusta es comenzar la rebusca (búsqueda de los primeros granos maduros de café) en el mes de apertura para la cosecha. Su dedicación y el amor que brinda a sus cultivos, hacen que sus productos sean de buena calidad. Además de renovar constantemente sus plantaciones de café. Cuenta que ella misma embolsa las semillas que germinarán en un vivero, donde permanece la mayor parte del fin de semana, en cuidarlos y mantenerlos. Por ello conocedores de su buen trabajo los comerciantes de café de la ciudad de Villa Rica, la buscan constantemente. Para el futuro desea seguir mejorando en sus cultivos. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Prestatarios de unión palomar” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde está segura podrá salir adelante con la ayuda de todos ustedes, además agradece el apoyo monetario de todos ustedes; prometiendo ser puntual en el pago de la cuotas. Bernardina de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios fertilizantes naturales para esparcirlos en sus plantaciones de café, medianos y grandes. Además de comprar semillas de café nueva para hacer viveros.
texts.en: Bernardina is a happy, 37 year old woman.  Her family includes her husband Emerson and their five children, all of whom are minors.  In the harmony of a close family, they live in their own house, located in the community of Unión Palomar (central Peruvian rain forest).  She knows that the road to progress is long, and more so with children to nurture and educate.  However, this doesn't discourage her, because she is a diligent, hard-working woman.  Agriculture is her main source of income.  Her crops consist of coffee, plantains, and avocado.  She has worked at this for the past 13 years and what she enjoys the most is beginning the "rebusca" (searching for the first ripe coffee beans) at the start of the harvest.  Her dedication and the love that she bestows upon her crops is what make her products the good quality that they are.  Besides working constantly in her coffee fields, she also bags the seeds that germinate in a nursery, where she spends the greater part of the weekend taking care of them.  Because the experts know of her good work, coffee merchants from the city of Villa Rica seek her business constantly.  In the future, she wishes to continue improving her crops.  She belongs to the communal bank “Prestatarios de unión palomar” and this is her second loan with MFP, where she is sure she will be able to move forward with the help of all of you.  Moreover, she is grateful for all of your monetary support, promising to be punctual with her payments.  Benardina, upon receiving your support, will invest the requested money in buying various natural fertilizers to spread on her medium and large coffee fields as well as to purchase new coffee seeds to start nurseries.

loans.use: to purchase coffee seeds and sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Sara

texts.es: Sara, de 45 años es una mujer valiente y emprendedora. No hay trabajo pesado para ella y gracias a su esfuerzo está saliendo adelante. Es madre de tres hijos de 21, 17 y 7 años, de ellos solo la mayor es independiente y los demás viven junto a ella y su esposo en una casa propia.El trabajo de Sara consiste en la venta de comida, ella por las mañanas sale a vender comida, jugos, sándwich, frente a una institución gubernamental de la región, por las tardes ella sale a vender queso, yogurt, vino, ropa y otros productos mas que sale mucho entre sus clientes, ella vende junto a sus hijas, además ella trabaja en la venta de menús.Le gusta de su trabajo que siempre esta en movimiento y lo que no le gusta es que tiene que salir muy temprano al mercado ya que termina el día agotada y le gustaría quedarse a descansar un poco mas, pero como el trabajo siempre es así tiene que realizar el sacrificio. Ahora ella esta intentando abrir su propia ferretería, espera poder conseguirlo y crecer en el futuro.Este es el tercer préstamo entre Sara y la institución MFP, espera poder realizar sus pagos de manera responsable como lo a hecho hasta ahora y seguir trabajando junto a este lindo grupo que conforma, además desea que pueda seguir trabajando con MFP y así poder crecer aun mas en su actividad.Con los 1500 soles solicitados, Sara comprará materiales e insumos para aumentar su producción en jugos, además ingredientes principales para la venta de su menú.
texts.en: Sara is 45 years old. She is a brave and enterprising woman. There is no heavy work for her and thanks to her hard work she is getting ahead. She is the mother of three children, aged 21, 17 and 7. Only the oldest is on her own and the others live with her and her husband in their own home. Sara's work is selling food. She goes out mornings to sell food, juice, and sandwiches in front of a regional government building. in the afternoon, she goes out to sell cheese, yogurt, wine, clothes and products that her customers like. She sells with her daughters and she also sells prepared meals. She likes her job which is always moving. What she doesn't like is having to go to the market very early since she is exhausted at the end of the day. She would like to be able to stay and rest a little more, but that is how the job always is, she has to make the sacrifice. Now she is trying to open her own hardware store. She hopes to be abel to do it and grow in the future. This is the third loan between Sara and the MFP institution. She hopes to be able to make her payments responsibly as she has done so far and keep working with this nice group she is a member of. She also wants to keep working with MFP and thus be able to grow even more with her activity. With the 1500 soles she has asked for, Sara will buy materials and ingredients to increase her juice production as well as the main ingredients for the prepared meals she sells.

loans.use: to buy materials and ingredients to increase her production of juices as well as the main ingredients for her prepared meals service.

loans.name: Yonson

texts.es: Yonson, de 22 años, es un hombre trabajador; conformó su familia hace un año. Vive con su esposa e hija en una casa alquilada, ubicada en el caserío de Purhuaracra. Su vida dio un cambió drástico, pues ahora tiene que ver por su familia, que es su principal motor. Su principal trabajo es la confección de polos de diferentes colores y tamaños; su trabajo consiste en coser las prendas en un taller textil que se sitúa en la capital del país. Después de 2 meses regresa a visitar a su familia, le es muy difícil estar lejos de ellos, pero saber que le brinda toda lo necesario, le da fuerzas para continuar. Además se siente contento con el apoyo de su esposa, quien le ayuda económicamente en el oficio de “la agricultura”, en terrenos alquilados siembra papa y una variedad de hortalizas como espinaca, lechuga y demás; de acuerdo a temporadas. Los cuales cuida con mucha dedicación, pero como se encuentra sola, comercializa sus cosechas a los intermediarios que visitan sus terrenos agrícolas, ya que no puede llevarlos al mercado mayorista de su ciudad. El principal proyecto de esta pareja es, comprar su propia casa. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Productores de purhuaracra” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde espera de un pequeño préstamo para seguir con sus planes. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Yonson de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcirlos en sus sembríos de papa de la variedad “yungay”.
texts.en: Twenty-two-year-old Yonson is a hardworking man who started a family one year ago.  He lives with his wife and daughter in a rented house in the neighborhood of Purhuaracra.  His life has changed drastically now that he has to take care of his family, which is what drives him most.  His main job is making polo shirts in different colors and sizes; his job consists of sewing the garments in a textile factory in the country's capital.  After two months he is able to return to visit his family.  It is very hard for him to be away from them, but the knowledge that it provides everything they need gives him the strength to carry on.  He is also happy to have the support of his wife, who helps him economically through farming on rented land.  She grows potatoes and a variety of vegetables such as spinach, lettuce, and others according to the season.  She looks after her crops with a lot of dedication, but as she is on her own, she sells her produce to the middle men who visit her farmland, since she can't take them to the city's wholesale market.  This couple's main goal is to buy their own home.  He belongs to the Productores de Puhuaracra Communal Bank and this is his second loan with MFP, where he is currently awaiting a small loan to continue his plans.  He promises to make his payments punctually.  If he were to receive your help, Yonson would invest the loan money in purchasing natural fertilizers to spread in the "yungay" variety of his potato crops.

loans.use: To buy bags of natural fertilizers

loans.name: Ameri

texts.es: Ameri, de 53 años es una mujer soltera y muy dedicada a su familia. Ella vive en casa de sus padres que son ancianos, ubicados en el caserío de Purhuaracra. Ella es una mujer sencilla, toda su vida la dedicó a apoyar a sus hermanos menores, cuidando a sus sobrinos a los que quiere mucho. Pero como buena mujer del campo ella se dedica a la agricultura. En sociedad con su hermana siembran diversos pastos naturales, como avena, alfalfa y alcacer, los que le sirven a ella para su negocio de compra y venta de alfalfa, que según su experiencia, es el pasto de mejor calidad y muy difícil de ser producido, ya que necesita muchos cuidados. Después de comprar diferentes sembríos de pasto, ella lleva a comercializar a la localidad de San Pedro de Cajas una vez al mes, además de ir ocasionalmente al caserío de Palcamayo. Consiente de sus necesidades económicas, ella también compra ovejas en cantidad; las que engorda y comercializa a un mayor precio, está actividad le brinda un dinero extra para salvarla de cualquier apuro. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Productores de purhuaracra” y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para continuar con sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con sus cuotas. Ameri de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios kilos de pastos naturales “alfalfa”, pues el precio de venta esta subiendo y desea abastecer su venta hasta diciembre.
texts.en: Fifty-three-year-old Ameri is a single woman who is very dedicated to her family.  She lives with her elderly parents in the neighborhood of Purhuararca.  She is a modest person who has dedicated her entire life to helping her younger siblings, taking care of her nieces and nephews whom she loves very much.  But, like a good country woman, she farms for a living.  Together with her sister, she grows various kinds of animal feed, such as oats, alfalfa, and barley, which help her with her business buying and selling alfalfa.  Her experience has shown that this is the best quality feed and the most difficult to produce, since it needs a lot of care.  After buying different sown fields of feed, she markets her produce in the town of San Pedro de Cajas once a month.  Occasionally, she will also market in the neighborhood of Palcamayo.  Because she is aware of her economic needs, she also buys large quantities of sheep, which she fattens and resells at a higher price.  This provides her with extra money to use in case of emergency.  She belongs to the Productores de Purhuararca Communal Bank and this is her fourth loan with MFP, where she hopes for your support in order to continue to pursue her goals.  She promises to make her payments on time.  If she were to receive your help, Ameri would invest the loan money in purchasing several kilos of alfalfa feed, since its sale price is rising and she wants to be supplied for sales through December.

loans.use: to buy several kilos of alfalfa

loans.name: Rebeca

texts.es: Rebeca, de 35 años es una valerosa madre soltera que cuida con amor a su hijo Antony de 2 años de edad. Ella vive en casa de su madre ubicada en el caserío de Purhuaracra. Su razón de progreso, es su hijo a quien desea brindarle la mejor educación. Razón por la que comenzó desde los 18 años a trabajar la tierra y dedicar sus fuerzas al oficio de la agricultura. Desde niña aprendió todo lo necesario para comenzar a sembrar papa y variedad de hortalizas como espinaca, lechuga y demás. Asimismo trabaja en sociedad con su hermana en la siembra de alfalfa. Lo que más le gusta a ella es comercializar sus cosechas a la ciudad de Tarma, pero según cuenta en temporadas de mayor venta, lleva a vender sus verduras a la capital del país. Paralelo a este trabajo, también se dedica a la ganadería, con la compra y venta de ganado ovino y vacuno, los cuales enseba para luego venderlos a un mayor precio, comenta que hay épocas donde duplica el valor de lo comprado. Ahora ella desea ahorrar lo necesario para mejorar sus cultivos. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Productores de purhuaracra” y este es el tercer crédito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo financiero de todos ustedes. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Rebeca de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varias cabezas de ganado ovino, asimismo en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir en su próxima siembra de papa “andina”.
texts.en:
Rebeca, age 35, is a valiant single mother who lovingly cares for her two-year-old son Antony. She lives at her mother’s house in the village of Purhuaracra. Her reason for making progress is so that she can provide her son the best education. Rebeca has been working the land since she was 18 years old and has dedicated her efforts to farming. As a young girl, she learned everything that is required for growing potatoes and a variety of other vegetables such as spinach, lettuce, and other crops. She also grows alfalfa with the help of her sister. What she enjoys most is selling her crops in the city of Tarma. However, if her crops are in season, then she will take them to Lima to sell so that she can get a better price.

In addition to farming, Rebeca also raises livestock. She buys and sells sheep and cattle. Rebeca fattens the animals for eventual resale at a better price. She says that there are times when her returns are double the value of her original purchase price. Now she wants to save in order to improve her crops.

Rebeca is a member of the Communal Bank “Productores de Purhuaracra” (Producers of Purhuaracra) and this is her third loan with MFP. She hopes to obtain everyone’s financial support and promises to submit her payments on time. Once she receives the assistance, she will invest the money she requested in the purchase of several heads of cattle and sheep. She will also buy natural fertilizers to apply on her next crop of Andean potatoes.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and fertilizers.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es: La señora Sandra nacida en Valle grande el tiene 4 hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, ella es madre soltera, su actividad es la agricultura, se dedica a la siembra de verduras como ser; perejil, acelga y camote, todo lo que ella siembra lo saca a la venta directamente del productor al consumidor, el dinero del prestamo lo utilizara en la siembra de perejil y camote y en lo que implica el preparado de la tierra, ella vive en Jorochito tiene su propia casa donde vive con sus 4 hijos y también se dedica al alquiler de motosierra que alquila a sus vecinos también para el uso en la agricultura, es una persona trabajadora, sola saca adelante a su hijos, por ellos trabaja duro para algún día poder verles personas de bien y profesionales.
texts.en:
Sra. Sandra was born in Valle Grande. She is a single mother and has four children who are of school age. Sandra engages in farming and grows vegetables such as parsley, spinach, and sweet potatoes. Everything that she produces is sold directly to the consumer.

The money from this loan will be used for preparing her land so that she can plant parsley and sweet potatoes. Sandra lives in Jorochito and has her own home where she lives with her four children. She also rents out a chainsaw to her neighbors to use in their farming activities. Sandra is a hardworking individual who is able to move her children forward on her own. She works hard so that some day she can see them become successful professionals.

loans.use: to buy supplies for planting parsley and sweet potatoes.

loans.name: Susana

texts.es: Susana, de 55 años es una mujer muy trabajadora y con ganas de sobre salir, esta separada de su esposo y vive en casa de su padre junto a el y su hijo.El trabajo de Susana consiste en la venta de bebidas, realiza esta actividad en su casa, lleva ya un aproximado de de seis años, trabaja sola ya que su hijo  trabaja en otras actividades y no puede apoyarla.Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que siempre le gusto mucho el mundo de los negocios y también le da tiempo para poder realizar otras actividades, ella sabe que el negocio que tiene es rentable ya que siempre tiene ingresos y clientes, espera para más adelante poder poner su bodega de abarrotes y una librería.Este es el segundo préstamo entre Susana y la institución MFP, le gusta el grupo que es parte y espera poder seguir trabajando con la institución como lo ha hecho ya que siente es una gran ayuda.Con el monto solicitado de 1500 soles, ella comprar bebidas para tener en su almacén, ya que se ha incrementado el costos y espera tener en su almacén para no tener que invertir mucho mas adelante.
texts.en:
Susana, age 55, is a hardworking woman who is eager to move forward. She is separated from her spouse and lives at home with her father and her son. Susana’s job involves selling beverages, which she does from home. She has been in business for approximately six years. Susana works alone since her son works in other activities and is not able to help her. She has always enjoyed working and being part of the business world. In addition, she spends time pursuing other activities. Susana knows that her business is profitable and is always able to generate income and attract customers. She hopes to get ahead by establishing a grocery store and a bookstore.

This is her second loan with MFP. She enjoys being part of her group and hopes to continue working with MFP because she feels it has been a great help. With the amount of 1500 PEN that she requested, Susana will buy beverages to stock her warehouse. The cost of these products has increased, so she hopes to build a warehouse in order to avoid investing more money later.

loans.use: to buy beverages in bulk.

loans.name: Noel

texts.es: El señor Noel, se dedica a la fabricación de mallas,  casado con la señora Lenndy, desde hace 3 años, tienen 2 hijos y actualmente están dedicados a este emprendimiento de la fabricación de mallas olímpicas, toda la familia se dedica a esta actividad, necesitaban el préstamo para la compra de motor eléctrico y materia prima y así poder  equiparse poco a poco y formar una empresa rentable ya que tienen muchos pedidos. El cliente esta agradecido con ese crédito.
texts.en:
Sr. Noel manufactures screens. He has been married to Sra. Lenndy for three years. They have two children and currently engage in this venture of making large screens. Everyone in their family participates in this business. Noel needs a loan to buy an electric motor and raw materials so that he will be equipped. Gradually over time, he hopes to have a profitable business since he already has many orders.

Noel is grateful to Emprender for this loan.

loans.use: to buy an electric motor and raw materials for making screens.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es: El señor Ernesto nacido en Chuquisaca casado con la Sra. Prospera con 5 hijos, 3 mayores y 2 menores tiene su parcela en villa San Carlos a 25 km de Limoncito donde trabajan y vive el se dedica a la agricultura y también sacan maderas paras las carpinterías, es primera vez que trabaja con Emprender, el aprovecho la promoción que le hicimos ya que estaba necesitando para la siembra de sandia y lo que implica el preparado de la tierra fue una oportunidad buena  ya que le abrimos un nuevo camino para su negocio, es una persona muy trabajadora y se encuentra agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Sr. Ernesto was born in Chuquisaca and is married to Sra. Prospera. They have five children, three adults and two minors. He has a plot of land in Villa San Carlos, which is 25 km from Limoncito, where he works and lives. Ernesto engages in farming, but he also harvests lumber for the carpentry shops.

This is the first time he has worked with Emprender. He is taking advantage of a promotional offer because he needs the funding in order to prepare his land for growing watermelon. This is a good opportunity to start a new branch for his business.

Ernesto is a hardworking individual and is grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for growing watermelon.

loans.name: Marcia Lindaura

texts.es:
La señora Marcia se dedica a la venta de alimento balanceado para animales bovinos y porcino, se dedica a esta actividad  desde hace  dos años, su esposo es el encargado de realizar varios viajes y buscar mercados junto con su esposa para la comercialización del producto,  tiene  5 hijos de los cuales estudian en colegio,  adicionalmente a esta actividad la señora Marcia esta empezando con la cría  de pollos parrilleros para la venta sus hijos les ayudan a contribuir en este negocio La señora cuenta  con condiciones precarias para el almacenamiento de su productos y solicita el crédito para la construcción de un tinglado (silo Un silo es una estructura diseñada para almacenar grano y otros materiales a 
granel; son parte integrante del ciclo de acopio de la agricultura) para que no se les desperdicie el producto, ya que tuvo malas experiencias con las lluvias, es una persona muy trabajadora.
texts.en:
Sra. Marcia sells balanced animal feed for cattle and pigs. She has been in this business for two years. Her husband is in charge of making several trips and searching for markets, while she is in charge of selling the product. They have five children who are in school. In addition to this business, Sra. Marcia began raising broiler chickens to sell. Her children help with this business.

Sra. Marcia has inadequate conditions for storing her products, so she is requesting a loan in order to build a silo (a structure designed for storing grain or granular materials, which is essential in farming as part of the harvesting cycle). She does not want any of her product to go to waste because she has had bad experiences caused by the rains. Marcia is a hardworking individual.

loans.use: to build a silo for storing animal feed.

loans.name: Anatolia

texts.es: Anatolia, natural de la ciudad de Quimbiri de 41 años, es una mujer sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Benjamín de 46 años y sus 03 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindarle  un futuro prometedor. Anatolia viene realizando la actividad del agro hace 23 años con mucho esmero y laboriosidad,  por que gracias a los frutos que le brinda sus cultivos de cacao y café ella adquirió más espacios de terreno para cultivar. Pero en tiempos de cosecha y deshierbo de malezas necesariamente contrata jornaleros para poder avanzar con mayor celeridad en cuanto a su faena programada. Por otra parte compró su propio lote de terreno donde actualmente viven los miembros de su familia. Asimismo cuenta con una hectárea de terreno sin cultivar,  lo cual necesita de capital para plantar cacao, y  por tal acude a los prestamos que la institución MFP facilita a las personas de bajos recursos con miras a progresar. Para el bien de su trabajo espera contar con la misma fuerza e ímpetu que la caracteriza para sacar adelante  a sus hijos. Este será su crédito número 15 con MFP y por ello espera de su colaboración para poder concretar sus planes y se compromete a pagar puntualmente sus cronogramas de pago ya que desea acceder a otros préstamos posteriormente. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles comprará más semillas de cacao para extender la siembra de éste fruto.
texts.en:
Anatolia is 41 years old and a native of Quimbiri. She is a modest and hardworking woman who lives in her own home with her husband Benjamín, age 46, and their three beloved children from whom she wants to provide a promising future. Anatolia has been farming for 23 years. With great care and effort, she grows cacao and coffee. As a result of her production, she was able to acquire more space for growing these crops. Whenever she has to remove weeds or harvest her crops, Anatolia hires laborers to help with these tasks so that the work gets completed faster and she can stay on schedule. She purchased another piece of land where she currently lives with her family.

Anatolia has one hectare of land that has not been cultivated, so she needs capital for planting cacao. For this reason, she has approached MFP since the organization provides loans to people of limited resources who are looking to make progress. For the sake of her work, she hopes to bring the same level of effort and energy that she demonstrates when she is raising her children.

This is her 15th loan with MFP and she hopes to receive the necessary assistance so that she can accomplish her goals. Anatolia promises to complete her payments on time, just as she did with her previous loans. The loan of 2000 PEN that she requested will be used to buy more cacao seeds so that she can increase her plantings.

loans.use: to buy cacao seeds.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
This is Cecilia, 62, a resident of Dasmariñas, Cavite City, Philippines. She is married to Leandro, an employee, and is the mother of five children, all of whom are already working. She works hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Cecilia operates a food stall. In the Philippines, the whole working community and most families only eat home-cooked meals in the evening when all of the family members are home to take part in the meal. This is not only a usual family tradition but a matter of convenience and frugal living. It is considered a waste of money and time to spend cooking gas and food for one to two people when buying cooked rice and viands costs less than raw food. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 366 Philippine Pesos (PHP)  in sales every day.

To help her continue business operations, she is requesting a Php19,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more meat, rice, vegetables, condiments and seasonings. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Cecilia would like to give her grandchildren a good, high quality education, as well as to help her children. She also hopes to have her house renovated by the end of the year. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for raw ingredients and products needed in her business

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: La señora Virginia nacida en Santa Cruz, casada con el señor Ángel, tiene 58 años D. edad, La señora se dedica a la realización y decoración D. Eventos Sociales como matrimonios. Fiestas D. cumpleaños te piñatas y todo tipo D. eventos sociales, se dedica a esta actividad hace varios años. Tiene 4 hijos ya mayores D. edad todos independientes. El crédito otorgado es para la compra D. tela para la decoración D. mesas y sillas, se siente muy feliz por el apoyo brindado ya que D. esta forma mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Sra. Virginia was born in Santa Cruz and is married to Sr. Ángel. She is 58 years old and operates a business that involves making and providing decorations for social events such as weddings, birthday and piñata parties, and other occasions. Virginia has been in business for several years. She has four children who are already grown and independent.

The loan will be used to buy fabric for decorating tables and chairs. She is very happy with the support that has been provided because it will help her improve her earnings.

loans.use: to buy fabric for decorating tables and chairs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sacks of compost and manure.

loans.name: Geronimo Serapio

texts.es: El Señor Gerónimo se dedica  al transporte público, como taxi trufis de una línea que hace el recorrido por las zonas mas concurridas de la ciudad de Cochabamba,  con una experiencia superior a los 5 años en el rubro. Vive en la casa de sus suegros con sus 2 hijos, su esposa se encuentra trabajando en Comercio quien le ayuda con los gastos del hogar. El crédito es para realizar un mantenimiento general a su vehículo, ya que esta presentando algunas fallas y esto no le permite brindar un buen servicio a sus clientes, es una persona joven y trabajadora con ganas de salir adelante agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Sr. Gerónimo provides public transportations services. He is part of a taxi fleet that travels through the busiest areas of the city of Cochabamba. Gerónimo has five years of valuable experience in this field. He lives at the home of his in-laws with his two children. His wife works in retail and helps with the household expenses.

This loan will be used to pay for maintenance since his vehicle is suffering from a few defects that are preventing him from providing good service to his customers. Gerónimo is a jovial and hardworking individual who desires to succeed. He is grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided.

loans.use: to pay for vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Donatila

texts.es:
Donatilda, de 47 años, es una mujer entusiasta y trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Deonicio de 48 años y sus 03 queridos hijos a quienes desea brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. Donatilda desde muy niña trabajaba en las tierras de sus padres, con sus ahorros acumulados mas la herencia que heredó de sus padres hoy tiene 04 hectáreas de terreno y los trabaja con mucho ahínco, por lo que  ha logrado volverlas muy productivas. Entre los productos que cultiva, son: el cacao, café y hojas de coca, productos que luego los lleva a vender hasta los centros de acopio situados en la ciudad de San Francisco y Quimbiri, donde las vende al por mayor. Sus frutos le han dado los ingresos necesarios para mantenerse y cubrir con los gastos familiares, lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos, ya que se siente muy feliz haciéndolo, lleva 23 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos desde la chacra hasta los centros donde secan los frutos, por ello contrata jornaleros para que le apoyen en el traslado. Con el crédito solicitado comprará más plantas de cacao para luego injertarlos y sacar buen provecho de sus frutos en corto tiempo. En adelante, desea comprar nuevas tierras para incrementar sus cultivos. Este será su crédito numero 12 con MFP, por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para poder cumplir con sus objetivos, Por otro lado se compromete una vez más de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en su anterior crédito. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos los integrantes son personas responsables.
Con los 3,000 nuevos soles comprará plantas de cacao para posteriormente injertarlos y sacar buena ventaja de sus frutos en menor tiempo.
texts.en:
47-year-old Donatilda is an enthusiastic and hard-working woman who lives in her own home together with her partner, 48-year-old Deonicio, and her three beloved children who she would like to provide with a better quality of life.  Donatilda worked on her parents' land from a very young age.  With some savings that she had and her inheritance from her parents, she now owns four hectares of land which she works diligently and has managed to make very productive.  

Amongst the crops that Donatilda grows are cacao, coffee and coca leaf.  She takes her produce and sells it wholesale to middlemen in the towns of San Francisco and Quimbiri.  Her crops have provided her with the income she needs to support herself and cover her family expenses.  What she most enjoys about her work is caring for her crops as she feels very happy doing this.  She has been in this business for 23 years and she considers the most difficult part of her work to be transporting her crops from her farm to the warehouse centers where they are dried.  For this reason, she hires laborers who help her transport her crops. 

Donatilda will use the loan she has requested to buy more cacao plants which she will graft and thereby profit from their fruit quickly.  In the future, Donatilda would like to buy more land so that she can increase her crops.  This will be her 12th loan from MFP and she hopes to receive this small loan so that she can achieve her goals.  For her part, she pledges to make her repayments on time as she did with her previous loan.  

Donatilda enjoys being part of her community bank because all of the members are responsible people.  She will use the 3,000 Peruvian soles to buy cacao plants so that she can graft them and thereby profit from their fruit more quickly.

loans.use: to buy cacao plants

loans.name: Ma. Elena

texts.en:
Ma.Elena is married and has two children. She sells groceries such as sugar, rice, oil and noodles. Her small store is located in her house. She has been working in this business for two years. Ma. Elena chose this type of work to help her husband and to have more income for the household. 

A challenge that Ma. Elena faces is her youngest daughter’s health. At this time it is too cold. She faces this challenge by being very careful with her daughter’s health as well as being careful with the rest of the family's health.

She will use the loan to buy merchandise for her store. Ma. Elena’s dream is to see her business grow until it becomes a large grocery store.

She is a very enterprising person. Together with her husband, she is very optimistic about getting her children ahead. She is very grateful for the opportunity to grow and to reach her dreams.

loans.use: to buy drinks, spices, milk, candies and snack foods for her store

loans.name: Fernando

texts.en:
Fernando is 41 years old and has four children. He now lives in the rural area of Ilagan province, Isabela, where he engages in his economic activities.

Fernando is a nice, responsible, hard-working man who currently engages in the rental of a rice mill machine in their community. He has been engaged in this activity for seven months already, and things are going very well thanks to the determination with which he works. 

On this occasion, Fernando is requesting a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy spare parts to repair the machinery of his rice mill machine. He hopes to be able to sustain the needs of his family and to save for the future.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his rice mill machine

loans.name: Cheryll

texts.en:
Cheryll is 31 years old. She is married and has one infant-aged child. She has been operating a livestock business for the past six years, making a monthly profit of PHP 2,000. She is borrowing PHP 4,000 with which she plans to purchase more livestock (four pigs) for sale. 

With the anticipated profit, she plans to establish a piggery. In the future, she hopes to have a big piggery farm and to be selling meat to the town market.

In the future, Cheryll hopes that her business expands so they can build their own house.

loans.use: to buy four pigs

loans.name: Marvie

texts.en:
Marvie operates a grocery store in the rural area of Ilagan. She is married and takes care of four children. Marvie has been selling different products like spices, bread and drinks for one year. The income she makes from her sales is used to pay school fees and utility bills.

She is asking for a loan amounting to PHP 5,000. Her loan will be used to buy more provisions to sell. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to provide a meaningful education for her children.

loans.use: to buy drinks, snack foods, vinegar and bread

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna, aged 34, has been managing a business that provides motorcycle services for more than four years. She started earning her livelihood in this manner once her children were grown. Her children are now older and more responsible.

This loan will be used to buy tires, upholstery for the seats, as well as to pay for a few repairs. Myrna knows that there is plenty of competition, so she provides the best service to her customers so that they remain satisfied. Her dream is to obtain another vehicle for generating additional household income.

loans.use: to buy tires and upholstery for the seats of her tricycle

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: El Sr. Francisco tiene como actividad principal transportista y administrador,  propietario de una flota que realiza viajes a los Yungas y a los lugares de Caranavi Guanay lugares cálidos del norte de la ciudad de La Paz, vive en la Zona Pampahasi una zona comercial y trabaja con  el Sindicato Mixto de Transportes, es casado su esposa vive en Guanay y le ayuda con su negocio de venta de frutas, el señor Francisco fue cliente puntual y responsable del banco de emprendimiento Chicas Poderosas que por motivo de salud no pudo renovar su crédito y ahora que  se encuentra recuperado solicita el crédito individual  para el mantenimiento en el cambio de tapiz de asientos y cambio de piso, esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Francisco works as a transport provider and administrator.  He owns a bus that travels to Los Yungas, Caranavi and Guanay - warm places to the north of the city of La Paz.  He lives in Pampahasi (a commercial area) and works for the 'Sindicato Mixto de Transportes' (a transport union).  Francisco is married.  His wife lives in Guanay and helps him with a fruit business.

Francisco was a punctual and responsible member of the 'Chicas Poderosas' community bank but was unable to renew his loan for health reasons.  Now that he is better he is requesting an individual loan to carry out some work on his bus, replacing the seat coverings and floor.  He is very grateful to the institution for the support they have given him.

loans.use: to replace the seat coverings and floor of his bus

loans.name: Ma. Ester

texts.en:
Ma. Ester is engaged in pig breeding. She lives in a rural area of Ilagan province, Isabela. Ma. Ester is a hard-working mother.

She is asking for a loan of PHP 4,000 because she would like to increase the number of pigs and to establish a large farm.

With the loan’s help, Ma. Ester will develop her business and increase her income. Additional income will help Ma. Ester to ensure a sustainable future for her family. Ma. Ester lives together with her husband and children.

loans.use: to buy more pigs

loans.name: Leliosa

texts.en:
Leliosa is 58 years old and widowed with eight children.

Leliosa works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like toothpaste, groceries, etc. in her sari-sari store.

Leliosa has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for four years and also earns income from pig raising.

Leliosa aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional items to sell.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 56 years old and married with two children.

Teresita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a small-scale ready-to-wear clothes business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Teresita has borrowed and repaid six loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the ready-to-wear clothes for 8 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Teresita aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Vicente Baudilio

texts.es: El Sr. Vicente y su esposa Ronmy llevan muchos años de vivir juntos. Ellos residen en la localidad de Cotoca en la casa de la madre del señor Vicente. Tienen dos hijos. Don Vicente trabaja como taxista en Santa Cruz con su movilidad y su esposa administra el servicio de amplificación. El crédito solicitado es para comprar nuevos parlantes por que los que tiene ahora se encuentran deteriorados. Esta muy agradecido por que emprender le esta dando la oportunidad de renovar su equipo de amplificación y de esta manera generar mas ingresos para mejorar la calidad de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en:
Vicente and his wife Ronmy have lived together for many years.  They live in the town of Cotoca, in Vicente's mother's house, and have two children.  Vicente works as a taxi driver in Santa Cruz.  His wife manages their sound system service.

Vicente is requesting this loan to buy new speakers as the ones that he has now are in a bad state of repair.  He is very grateful that Emprender are giving him the opportunity to renew his sound system equipment so that he can make more income and improve his whole family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy new speakers

loans.name: Joy Ann

texts.en:
Joy Ann, aged 38, is a resident of Caloocan City, Philippines. She is the mother of three children, the oldest is already working  while the youngest stays at home.
